Summary: My first time @ this Homewood in Aliso Viejo & found it AMAZING!  So clean hotel!  The minute you walk into the lobby, you know it is special.  Derek @ the Front Desk is just WONDERFUL!   He is very kind & extremely helpful!  The lobby is clean & the rooms are so clean.  I used the laundry facilities & found them new & efficient.  Warm breakfast is a GRAND experience! Freeway is close & shopping is near.  I will return to this location soon.

Great location. Easy walk to shops and dining. Very comfortable. Beautiful fresh flowers and fireplace in lobby. Lush furnishings on poolside lanai. Amazing complimentary breakfast. Room was spacious and well appointed. Loved the separate seating area and full kitchen.

The employees here are unresponsive and uncaring to their guests who spend thousands of dollars on their "hotel service" where they don't clean rooms and don't change towels (even when you specifically request them).  Made a *terrible* mistake of choosing to stay here for over a week and expected fresh sheets and towels (at the bare minimum)- asked SEVERAL times and the room wasn't cleaned ONCE over a week and a half.  I've emailed "management" (Jerilyn Branco) And the Head of Sales here and not once, but TWICE and i've not received a single email from ANYONE since September!? Ridiculous.  They clearly don't care about customers, or follow-up. Hilton Homewood Suites gets Negative 5 stars from me. What a joke.  I'd like to add that I am not the only one experience this lack of
Manager Response: Hi kahliem2022, We apologize that our service did not meet your expectations during your stay. We understand how frustrating it is when requests are not appropriately handled. We are truly sorry that our team was unable to meet your needs and that you did not receive a response. We strive to ensure that our guests are provided with the best experience possible and we apologize that we did not meet that standard during your stay. We take customer feedback very seriously and we are actively working to improve our service. Thank you for bringing this issue to our attention.

Summary Heading: Great stay- less than 20 min drive to beaches.
Summary: I read the previous reviews about noise, cleanliness, problems with parking and breakfast times and was wary.  But seriously, we had no problems with this hotel during the week we stayed. We stayed here when it was brand new and, yes, it’s a bit worn. But the staff was very friendly and responsive to requests for towels, coffee etc.  breakfast was great and the Wednesday night social was very nice.
Room tip: Set up an account with The Toll Roads to make driving easier. Use Waze for directions.

Summary Heading: It sad that this hotel is basically down the hill
Summary: I was extremely disappointed with my last stay at this property, used to be my to go hotel in Orange County, CA.  Unclean bathroom and carpet, shower is moldy, carpet is smelly, running out of breakfast around 8:30am (breakfast start at 7). Toilet was also broken, when you flush, the dirty water splashes all over the place, I had to close the toilet seat cover just to be able flush without getting splash by dirty toilet water. The "Complimentary Housekeeping" is simply ridiculous, why do I even pay you to stay there. Since I stayed there for 5 days, they told me I can only requested for 1 complimentary full cleaning and I can requested clean towels everyday, so I did, the first day my towels didn't even show up, so I had to requested again. Running out of toilet papers the
Manager Response: Benlkj, thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us, we truly appreciate the feedback. We are very sorry for the service you received, as requests from housekeeping should be completed after the first request. We strive to ensure that each one of our guests feels at home while staying with us.

Summary: 1/ Upon showering the first morning I could see dried blood on the toilet near the seat.  It was disgusting.  The toilet was never properly cleaned between guests. 2/ a baby gecko (yes a gecko not a lizard) was running around in the bathroom the first night.  We were on the second floor. 3/ there IS mold in the shower and on the wallpaper in the bathroom 4/ the ceiling fan blades ARE covered in dust 5/ on the 6th night the digital key didn't work, it took about 10 minutes until it finally did 6/ walking to and from the room we were sweating since there is no AC in the hallways  7/ on the 6th day, I called the front desk in the MORNING to have them remove the dirty towels on the bathroom floor that were piling up.  She asked someone could come in the room in the next 20 minutes
Manager Response: Judy M, thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us, we truly appreciate the feedback. We apologize for the status of the room and service you received. We strive to ensure that each one of our guests feels at home while staying with us, so I’m disappointed to read we have fallen short.

Summary Heading: Great location. Hotel needs maintenance. Breakfast choices lacking
Summary: The staff is great however the room cleanliness leaves a lot to be desired. Shower caulk had a considerable amount of mold. Carpets look dingy throughout. Elevators smell like wet dogs. Diamond members have to pay for parking. The only reason why I stay here is because it's convenient. May find another hotel for my next trip even if it is further away. The price is way too expensive for this lack of quality accommodation.
Manager Response: Fastcat15,  We are very sorry to hear about your experience and that is certainly not the impression we want to make. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and we hope you can accept our sincerest apologies. We will make sure to use this feedback as a learning opportunity for our team.

Summary: Another nice new build Homewood Suites. I like the squarish rooms as I think the rooms look better, are more functional, and comfortable too.  The full fridge and dishwasher are great for longer stays or recharging your ice packs before a long drive. Freeway convenient. For me this was a quickie. A Hilton at the right price in the right location.  I wasn't able to do breakfast etc, but I am sure it is the typical morning routine.

The staff from very welcoming and helpful all throughout our stay. The accommodation was very clean, comfortable and had everything we needed. The kids had a blast in the pool. We loved this place. We will definitely be back! Thank you Homewood Suites Aliso Viejo!

Summary Heading: Great location and well appointed rooms!
Summary: Location is prime and very quiet in the upper end of the suburbs! Friendly staff and decent complimentary breakfast! Spacious gym and rooms were nicely furnished. Outdoor was nicely decorated with an extension of the dining area!

Mold in and outside of shower. Ripped, peeling vinyl on ottoman. Dirty upholstery on the chair. Carpets are filthy in the hallways and at room door. We left as soon as we walked into the room. Expedia provided 100% refund with hotel management approval.
Manager Response: Hi p9649IUmichellep! We are very sorry to hear about your experience and that is certainly not the impression we want to make. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and we hope you can accept our sincerest apologies. We will make sure to use this feedback as a learning opportunity for our teams and making sure to be more focused on having the rooms be up to Hilton standards.

Summary: As I write this review I am listening to the loudest thuds footsteps of children running amock and jumping around in the room above me. They should either isolate parents and their children to one part of the hotel or are on ground floors only so solo travelers like myself (also, I do not have children to help kill planet Earth off a little bit more than already the case!) are not impacted by them running as though there is a playground in the rooms.  Insist when they are checking in with children, that they consider other guests staying here as part of their default process. I appreciate parents want a break... however they need to take responsibility and affirmative actions to make sure their children are not bounding across floors.  Or, Hilton should install better flooring
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear that your stay was marred by noise and other disruptive issues. We take the comfort and satisfaction of our valued guests very seriously. Our goal is to provide a peaceful and comfortable atmosphere for all of our guests. We understand how badly it can affect your stay if something was awry. We offer our apologies, as this is not the experience we strive to provide. We also have taken your suggestions on greater caution for children and noise level seriously, and will continue to review and implement the necessary procedures for a more smooth and quiet experience for our guests. We hope that you will give us an opportunity to redeem ourselves and provide you the quality accommodation you deserve.

Summary Heading: This hotel used to be nice
Summary: I don't recommend this hotel any more. It used to be nice. Not really now. They are using Covid as an excuse to not clean your room when they charge so much for a very dirty room. I didn't see people wearing masks in the hotel, except for the front desk, so I am not sure who is afraid of getting their rooms cleaned. A lot of the housekeeping folks rely on the tips, so if they don't clean the rooms, they are losing out on the tips. Our bathroom was disgusting and there was a hole in our shower wall. For Hilton, that charges $170+ a night, I didn't think the hotel cares for their guests anymore.
Manager Response: Hi TeaSnob4Ever, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Homewood Suites. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. Your feedback is important as our goal is to ensure every guest feels at home while staying with us. We hope you will consider staying at Homewood Suites in the future.

Summary: After spending the day at the beach we were happy to be able to settle down for the night. I went to the bathroom and there were three pubic hairs on the toilet. Then, I went to shower and there were long, dark hairs in the shower. I went to the front desk and we were given another room. The second room seemed dirtier than the first. There was hair in the shower again and on the bathroom shelf was a SHEIN stinker from an article of clothing. Obviously the shelf in the bathroom had not been cleaned. The bathroom sink looked like someone brushed their teeth and spit toothpaste onto the sink drain and it never got rinsed! Again, I went to the front desk and got another room. The THIRD room didn’t have hair in the shower so that was a bonus. The guy at the front desk was
Manager Response: We're so sorry to hear that your experience with our housekeeping staff was not up to par. We understand the frustration and regret that this was the level of service that was provided to you during your stay. We take guest expectations seriously and strive to provide a clean and comfortable environment to our valued guests. We apologize sincerely for the issues you encountered and have taken this opportunity to look into our housekeeping procedures to make sure this doesn't happen again. Thank you for bringing your experience to our attention and we hope you will give us a second chance.

Summary: Third time here since borders were opened. Our daughter lives very close to this hotel so it’s a perfect location for us. The staff are unbelievably helpful and the rooms are fantastic. Have everything you’ll need and when you need a top of anything - just ask the staff and it’s given immediately. Rooms are clean and spacious. Beds comfy and although pool area is small - it’s kept spotless too. We cannot fault this hotel. We have stayed in some fabulous hotels around the world and some could learn a lot from the staff here. Parking on site too makes it even easier. Starbucks opens at 4am for those who are jet lagged.

We ere supposed to have contactless check in by phone and hte system would not recognize me or the other party traveling with us.  The clerk was unhelpful and curtly said you will have to Coe in to the desk.  Our room was dirty, there were long black hairs in the bed, on the bathroom floor and on the toilet. and GROSS the toilet was not flushed.
Manager Response: Thank you again for your feedback. I’m very sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations and would love the opportunity to regain your trust. We strive to ensure that each one of our guests feels at home while staying with us. Next time you are in the area and are willing to give us another chance we will do our best to see that your stay not only meets, but exceeds your expectations.

Summary: Every part of my week- long stay at this hotel was filled with excellence. All staff members I encountered were super friendly and the rooms were spacious and clean. The full breakfast was awesome and the midweek social time with free drinks and snacks was the icing on the cake.

Never waste my time writing reviews but this place truly was the worst hotel stay I have ever had in my life. We did not receive a room key all weekend so we had to wait for staff to let us in and out of our room. Upon check in the woman at the front desk was so vile and nasty to me and ordered me to sit down while i was waiting for her to find me a room.. even though my reservation was made a week in advance. she left me sitting for about 30 minutes in the lobby with my luggage while she helped other guest and even offered for them to sure their amenities while they waited for their rooms. Eventually a manager and a supervisor came out to get me into a room once i began crying in their lobby because I was so frustrated with how I was treated like I was nothing. I was promised

Summary: Great location in a safe neighborhood. Pool area offered a lot of outdoor seating. Guest room was spacious and comfortable. Breakfast was a standard hotel food but something to get you going. Plenty of dining and entertainment close by. We will definitely stay here again when in the area. Close proximity to beaches make this hotel an oasis for family vacations.

Summary Heading: Was not happy with our stay rude people
Summary: Terrible place to stay not enough parking most everybody has to park almost a block away in a parking garage second floor only you're allowed to park there and then you walk all that way in the middle of the night unsafe and they charge you $10 to park no matter where you are parking there per night most of the staff is very rude especially the kitchen people they are so worried about what you're doing getting your food and they don't clean the tables they were filthy we had to ask for tables to be cleaned so we could sit down and eat the jacuzzi was shut down the whole time we're there because they could not get the chemicals right I think they just did not want to pay for the heater there was trash in the hall piled up in front of rooms for at least 24 hours before anybody

I have been loyal to this property and to Hilton for years.  This last experience was the worst every and I will reconsider my future reservations here.  The hotel itself is great but Andre ruined the entire experience.
Manager Response: Pioneer644721, thank you for your feedback. I’m very sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations and would love the opportunity to regain your trust. We strive to ensure that each one of our guests feels at home while staying with us and we will make sure that your next stay not only meets but exceeds your expectations.

Summary: The location is convenient with great food options nearby.  The overall vibe of the hotel is perfect.  Parking is the only real downside of this property and the on-site food options and spa tub were not available due to COVID restrictions.

Nice location; friendly and helpful staff: nice clean rooms. Entire hotel is well maintained and is in a very safe location that is not far from restaurants, movie theaters, 24 hr. pharmacy, supermarket and 15 min from beach.

We’ve stayed here many many times before, in fact this was always our choice for So Cal. But the front desk service at this hotel has entirely changed. As a Hilton gold member, we do travel a lot.  But the front desk staff at this hotel need to be trained on customer service.

Summary Heading: Clean hotel, with spacious suites, 12 minutes away from the beach. Great local restaurants.
Summary: The hotel is clean and safe. The Staff is very friendly and accommodating. The hotel was decorated in holiday spirit. It was beautiful. Complimentary breakfast was good. The hotel is near great restaurants and is 12 minutes away from the beach. Perfect price and the suite was spacious. Loved the hotel! We will return again!

We selected Homewood Suites because it was within walking distance of our son’s home over the Christmas Holiday. The hotel staff was welcoming and very informative - the room was wonderfully large and very clean! All of our needs were met - the staff was wonderful! We were very pleased with our stay and highly recommend this hotel!

Average hotel in a mostly residential/business location. About 15 minutes (no traffic) to the downtown area and essentially any restaurant. Excessively high pet fee for a “pet-friendly” location with no real relief area. The room was clean and the place is maintained well.

Good rooms, bad breakfast  They cleaned the room without permission  No restaurant in case room service Excellent rooms with kitchen, big refrigerator  Excellent bed, big TV Close to market place, beautiful are

Summary Heading: I would recommend this hotel to anyone.
Summary: Great hotel perfectly located near everything and clean with courteous staff. I like the fact they’re pet friendly and have a nice pool and spa. I would recommend this hotel to anybody. Definitely a good Bang for your buck.

Summary Heading: all Great at the Hilton HomeSuites Laguna Beach 2 week stay
Summary: My husband and I spent 2 weeks at the Hilton HomeSuites Laguna Beach/Aliso Veijo, CA visiting our son and his family.  From the front desk staff greeting us upon our entrance each evening and wishing us a great day as we left each morning made us feel very welcomed.  The complimentary breakfast each day was quite good but the breakfast staff was great, welcoming, helpful and kind!  The coffee in the lobby was also great... The cleaning staff was kind and helpful in meeting needs throughout the 2 weeks. Thank you again. We look forward to many stays in the future! Mary Ellen and Bob Walsh

My husband and I stayed there during construction in my home community. It worked great to have a fully equipped kitchen, good WiFi and a quiet place to work.  Excellent customer service. The complimentary breakfast is standard like any other hotel, nothing special. I appreciate that staff ask people to wear a mask and sanitize their hands before entering the food area.

The hotel was very nice and the breakfast was very good.  My room had a full kitchen but no plates or cups were provided.  I was there for two night. My room was not cleaned uo on the second day.  They said dure to covid they do not clean the room dailey.  Yet they charged the same rate for both days.  Poor excuse.

Hotel is newer, clean, and well run.  Staff was very friendly and helpful.  Breakfast was ok.  Only issues preventing a 5 rating is the ridiculous parking fee, and minimal immenities for Diamond Club members.

Summary Heading: Avoid staying here if you can - unless you like to be the one who cleans your room
Summary: This hotel has minimal breakfast offering - not much quality, room thermostat was off and I froze all night, they WILL NOT clean your room before 5 days - even if you request it.  There were limited towels, limited everything.  I want to avoid staying here ever again.

The room was a complete mess and there was poor communication with the staff. After requesting clean dishes and fresh towels, nothing was done. I have stayed at this hotel before and it was amazing. I don’t know what happened this time around, but I was disappointed.

The mattress was sunk and used. I reserved a 2 bedroom 2 bath suite. The quality of sleep was poor due to the mattress. The space was good but if you don’t get sleep it really is not a good vacation. The area is safe and clean.

Clean, quiet, safe area. Comfortable suites, very quiet and I slept great on the comfortable beds. Very walkable and pet friendly. Great pool, lounge areas and fire pit area. Hot breakfast and lovely, welcoming staff. We had a staycation so not sure of the surrounding area to visit. Fully stocked kitchen and fridge met our needs, and helped us have a wonderful girls weekend!

It was a business trip. 6 nights stay. No room service / cleaning during full stay. It was communicated that rooms will be cleaned after 6 days and not before. This is more cost saving than COVID related. A no go. Bar / restaurant closed. I had no car during my stay. Therefore, I had to eat at the hotel which was not possible. Food was offered for buying for microwave in room. But there was no silverware, even not a single plate / cup or glas available. My stay was a disaster.

The rooms were dirty and did not get cleaned our entire stay. Towels, soap & shampoo were not replaced unless asked. Beds were never cleaned. Garbage never emptied. Pillows were terrible. Breakfast was not like hotel 6 and you had to take to your room in tiny boxes.

Summary Heading: Overall good hotel with minor issues
Summary: Good stay. Close to Laguna beach. Found two food wrappers and empty water bottle behind nightstand. Also cover on cushion on couch wouldn’t stay on. Great breakfast and nice staff though. Parking gets full at night if hotel is full.

Great location, very clean, service was outstanding, didn’t make a big deal about masks (which is great), room was as expected, and they left treats in our room for our anniversary. A little pricey, but it’s SoCal.  Loved the area around the hotel.  Would come again!

We requested a top floor room and paid a premium for a king room close to $280 a night for the weekend. Our room came with a full kitchen and couch area, was very clean,  comfortable and quiet. Everything was quite nice as front desk lady was very friendly and kind. A couple of odd things: for the breakfast if you want tea you have to go to the front desk to ask for teabags, the breakfast is very generic generic with many offbrand & off tasting items such as the milk and raisin bran which had hard as rock raisins! Perhaps when Covid was not a thing the bar was staffed and the breakfast was better. All in all though it was quite a nice stay.

Everything was outstanding cleanliness, location, service, pool, spa, comfy bed, about 20 minutes from treasure island beach, which was perfect for our family trip!!! Just loved it here!! Will be going back soon!!!

This was a great stay for us to visit with family members living and visiting Aliso Viejo, California. We will look forward to our next staycation with Homewood suites. This was our best hotel stay to date in the area.

Summary Heading: Homewood Suites By Hilton Aliso Viejo Laguna Beach
Summary: Homewood Suites By Hilton Aliso Viejo Laguna Beach. The whole staff provided exceptional service! Hotel cleanliness was up to par and the breakfast was delicious as well. Thank you for an amazing stay!

Summary Heading: A potentially decent hotel with serious problems
Summary: The hotel is nice enough for what it is. However, the way it’s managed is horrible.  They charge $10 per night for parking. OK fair enough, that was on the website so I expected that. What they don’t say on the website is that they don’t have enough parking spaces for the number of rooms they have. In fact they are short about 20 parking spaces.  So what you find out is that when you come back from your evening ventures and there’s no parking spaces you have to park a quarter-mile away in some other business’s parking lot and walk back in the dark. Oh but it’s better than, because they’re basically sneaking you in to this other lot at night, so you have to get up at 6:30AM  to get your car out of their lot and pray there’s a place for you to put your car at the hotel, or keep

Removed maid service until 5 days had passed. Breakfast was basic and nothing like previously experienced. Did not provide basic microwave so food had to be taken to room to prepare. Bedding was damaged and of very poor quality. Executive Management of Hilton should be ashamed to let this previously fine hotel degenerate to dump class.

Good location,lot’s of shops around,  fairly close to the beach only about 5 to 7 minutes drive, very friendly staff and spacious room. Good value for the money, perfect for family and dog friendly the most important thing.

Given room which was not cleaned. 2nd room offered was also dirty. Stains on pillow cases, unknown substance on counter and dishes in the dishwasher, bath room floor was dirty. No soap in the room.  Asked to move to another room, which was also dirty.

3 out of 5 machines in the fitness center had no power. I notified front desk 3 days in a row and every day I was told maintenance would fix the problem, but nothing was ever done. The breakfast sandwiches were horrible, and the sink in the bathroom did not drain properly. Overall the hotel is not in bad shape but it's really sad when they can't fix simple problems.

Summary Heading: Did not feel that I was staying at a Hilton property
Summary: It was a miserable experience at the so called complimentary breakfast.  Rooms were not cleaned well and the sofa couch was very uncomfortable. The manager was very rude. The parking on the presides was not available although we paid got it upfront, and had to park a block away. I can keep going - please try to stay away from this property.

Was charged incorrectly for a half day. When called to have it corrected was advised couldn’t do it. My co-worker was super ill and we couldn’t leave the room on time. The least I was expecting was their understanding

Summary Heading: Worst customer service I’ve experienced in a Hilton
Summary: Very disappointed with service and how rude where employees @ front desk... to many issues to write about it all but won’t be coming back anytime soon here, no one bothered to solve any of the issues brought up, in fact they got mad and were condescending with us, I was sick and didn’t even want to bother by asking for a manager but it was bad, Lake Forest has much better service, aliso great location loved the decoration and hotel but service needs a lot of work, do yourself a favor and retrain your employees on customer service.

Room was not what I booked. Room was well-worn. Chose based upon location to family I was visiting. Surprisingly, the beds were comfortable but I booked a King and ended up with two fulls. Breakfast was good but they limited what you could take and one day was a lot of left overs.

This location provides you with a kitchen in the rooms, making it easy to take food home. The location is very close to many shops in the area, its also located on a quite street on one side, making it ideal for a quite sleep.

The home suite were great the rooms amenities were a nice touch with the refrigerator and microwave. The location was good it was very quiet and the front that’s ladies were very helpful and friendly.

This is a very nice hotel in a convenient and peaceful location.  However, there was one incident that left a bad taste in my mouth.  I made the reservation on Hilton's website, and in multiple communications, Hilton said that housekeeping service was available upon request.  We were staying for four nights in a two-bedroom suite, and my wife was joining us for the third night.  So that day, I asked for housekeeping service so the room would look good for my wife's arrival.  We kept the room clean, but I wanted it to look great for my wife's arrival, and one housekeeping service in four nights did not seem too much to ask especially since Hilton had promised the same.  Well, the desk clerk informed me that no service was available for stays of fewer than five nights per the

Not service oriented. Overpriced for just a place to sleep that does not meet cleaning standards. I will save management the pictures in hopes I for property to review and conduct proper inspection. Bathroom tile shows signs of mildew, excessive dust, and definitely not clean with visible dirt scuffs on coffee table. Upon checking out witness housekeeper cleaning room next door with what appear to be spraying rag with windex - explained the cleaning or therefore lack. The breakfast is a joke-box with hospital orange juice, yogurt, rotten boiled eggs that smelled, and a bagel with no cream cheese! Purchased a coke for the road from front desk, $4!! Really. You can get your money’s worth somewhere else not here.

The Homewood Suites in Aliso Viejo is a very well-maintained hotel in a nice, safe area of Aliso Viejo. The hotel is walking distance to a ton of restaurants and other retail such as grocery stores. I also really appreciated the full size kitchen in our suite.

This hotel is dated and old. Our room was not very clean when we checked in. The kitchen floor was super sticky and lacked even a full set of silverware. The room is very dark. Brown carpet, brown curtains, brown furniture ( all banged up )

Summary Heading: Decent hotel in great location but inconsistent customer service
Summary: I booked a stay for my parents at this hotel from 11/24/2020 through 12/31/2020 while their home was getting renovated.  I've heard from my parents that while not all the employees at that hotel were friendly/helpful, they couldn't stop raving about Ms. Jerilyn B.  Jerilyn greeted my parents with a smile whenever she saw them and always offered to help them with anything they needed.  I was nervous about my parents staying at a hotel because they don't speak English fluently and my dad is a COPD patient who needs to be connected to an oxygen concentrator at all times.  I was delighted to hear that Jerilyn made their stay easy and pleasant.  I truly appreciate Jerilyn's excellent customer service.  I've also made numerous calls to the hotel to either extend their stay or ask a

My stay here was not great. The PM staff was rude and not only to me, I had witnessed her being rude and not accommodating to other guests. An older lady and her husband in a wheel chair wanted to make sure they had booked a handicap room. The front desk girl let them know that they did not book one and proceeded to hand them keys to a non-handicap room. Of course the lady became irate and then the staff looked up a room and switched them. I felt bad for her. There was trash everywhere on the guestroom floors from guests that left it outside of their door. Had a weird smell on the 1st floor. Fitness center is closed, however when testing my key, I was able to go right in. Also, Fitness Centers are allowed to be open at hotels right now, so I am not sure why they didn't open it.

Would not stay here again. First off the lobby itself is nice, upon checking in the front desk was super short and didn’t provide any of the usual details or times such as breakfast, check out, pool hours etc. When my family got to the room it smelled a little like fish but could deal with it. My husband killed a spider in the bathroom and there were several small bugs on the bathroom counter. The ceiling fan was on its last leg and was horribly loud sounding as if it was going to fly off the ceiling any second. What made it even worse was only a small amount of toilet paper was left on the roll when we first got into the room and there was none to stocked in the room. Not ok especially when you’rea family of five. Plus I have an additional charge on my account that I have no

Nice clean hotel in a perfect location with lots of amenities. Great breakfast and quality food. Service was amazing and a shout out to the breakfast dude and to Sam at the front desk for taking care of his guests!! I’ll be back for sure!
Manager Response: Dear Meceebee ,   Thank you for taking the time to write such a great review about our hotel and the amenities that we offer. We can't wait to welcome you back to the hotel when your travels return you to Aliso Viejo.

Summary: Property was beautiful in a nice central location. The desk personnel were polite and friendly. The room was very clean, spacious and good looking. Everything worked and it was also quiet.  Each morning there was a variation in the breakfast. It has a better than usual breakfast but nothing to get excited about. There was a high school foot ball team all eating and really putting the employees to test. They did great. Promptly replacing items and keeping the eating area clean. They stayed friendly during all of this even when someone broke a dish right in the middle of a bunch of people and players all trying to fill their dishes at once. I would definitely stay here again. We were there for 4 days and stayed in a double bed suite on the 3rd floor.
Manager Response: Greetings Viola M, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us and your kind words. We are thrilled to read that the Homewood Suites Aliso Viejo allowed for you to make the most of your recent visit. It is great to know that you had an overall enjoyable stay with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Nice Place To Stay, Don't Use Your Credit Card Though....
Summary: The facility, the room, and the staff were all great.  My 2 rating is due to my credit card being charge multiple times, and for almost twice the amount of a single transaction at the bar.  The excess charges took 4 days for them to clear, leaving my account dry for traveling.

Pretty close off of CA-73 so easy to get to Laguna Beach, Newport Coast, etc from here. Clean and comfortable. Had a short stay, so not much more to say than that. Parking seems to be an issue. They give you a hang tag for the car.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience. I am happy to hear you found the comfort to your liking. We look forward to serving your travel needs at our property should you return to the area.

Summary: This is a nice looking hotel. It is clean but the staff is rude and unresponsive and the WiFi is not reliable. Because of the building cellphone signal is poor inside so WiFi is a must. The staff is rude. The breakfast tastes terrible. Perhaps the worst tasting hotel breakfast I have had.
Manager Response: Greetings Percy N, I appreciate you taking the time to express your concerns in regards to your recent stay at our hotel. I would like to apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused you. I have communicated your concerns with the appropriate departments and these issues will be addressed.   It is our goal to consistently provide the highest quality in both product and service, and it’s vital to our continued success to know when we have fallen short of our own high standards. Let me say that every employee at our hotel is committed to providing a positive and enjoyable experience for our guests, and apologize for what you had the misfortune of experiencing.  I sincerely hope you will allow us another opportunity to demonstrate our true level of hospitality and interest in serving you properly.  Again, thank you for sharing your concerns.

Summary: Employees and staff are great, the location while convenient for purpose of my stay (close to my office), unless you are driving or Uber for getting somewhere, the hotel is relatively out of many shopping/after hours activities.

Clean and nicely appointed.  Staff was very helpful and courteous.  Rooms were large with separate bedrooms. Did not enjoy the complimentary breakfast, though.  Hopefully that will get better before my next stay.

Summary Heading: Excellent stay at Homewood Suites in Aliso Viejo
Summary: As a Hilton Diamond member and frequent business traveller, I think I know a good hotel when I see one -- this is one!  The facilities were first rate, room always clean, convenient location, free parking and wonderful staff.  I'd like to recognize SALLY (Front Desk Mgr) and TITO (Food Service) in particular for their outstanding level of customer service.  We had a wonderful experience, start to finish -- will be back.
Manager Response: Greetings,  Thank you for choosing our hotel and for taking time to leave such great feedback. So happy to hear that you would stay here again. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: Great staff. We were greeted with a friendly smile and treated like we knew each other for years.  The room was amazing and very modern. The evening social was a bonus for a weary traveler. The breakfast was top notch the next morning!
Manager Response: Dear 1966modelNewby,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback with regards to your stay experience. We are delighted to know that the Homewood Suites Aliso Viejo allowed for you to make the most of your recent visit. We will be sure to share your kind words with our team. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Happy with our choice to stay a week!
Summary: We spent  7 nights here and were overall very happy with our stay.  The Pros: room was great with an efficiency kitchen, full fridge and (unnecessarily) large dishwasher.  Breakfast was quite sufficient but what made it great was a wonderful gentleman I believed named Tito (African American) who just seemed to love his job, love people and wanted to make sure everyone was enjoying their experience. Kudos to that guy! Their Mon-Thurs happy hour/snack supper was awesome!! What a bonus to have some wine and salad, snacks - usually enough that we didn't need dinner. HUGE plus and money saver. Loved the bartender Olga. She was friendly, hilarious, and so interesting. Sam at the front desk was helpful and patient.  Brett at the happy hour supper was always attentive and even
Manager Response: Dear Lachance16,  Its reviews like yours that validate the hard work and attention to detail that we practice day to day. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and for taking the time to write such a wonderful review. We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Aliso Viejo. Thank you again.

Summary: I'm Travel 5 times a year for business just came back from a 2 week stay at the HOME2SUITS BY HILTON in Joliet in Illinois best service ever !  We like Hilton because of the service and plus the room are great !  My secretary made a reservation for 3 rooms at this hotel unfortunately before traveling i forgot my wallet at home so I wasn’t able to provide a credit card at the time of my check in . I call my  secretary for her to provide a credit card to be able to check in ( I totally understand that is a policy to have a credit card for incidentals.) my secretary send emails to MARTHA at the reception to be able to check in our  business credit card that was on file. SAM didn’t help at all we had to wait for MARTHA To be able to check emails and credit card on file after 15

Great location and hotel was awesome.  The breakfast was great hashbrowns, waffles, sausage, eggs, etc.  The kitchen came equipped with necessary items, dishwasher, refrigerator, plates, etc. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Greetings, Thank for choosing to stay with us! Thank you too for the great feedback and review. I am happy to read that you enjoyed your stay. We really hope to see you back in the near future.

Summary: If I had to choose the single best memory of my hotel stay, it would be the excellent quality of the cut-up fresh fruit bowl served every morning at the complimentary breakfast.  Also, the staff were very friendly.  My stay was impacted by the Christmas holiday.  Some hotels "go big" and holidays are an extravaganza there but Homewood Suites in Aliso Viejo does not do that.  Accommodating the employees' Christmas-time vacation needs is a valid choice but guests should be aware of the reduced holiday offerings compared to other places (for example, the Disneyland resort) that offer Christmas dinner, elaborate seasonal decorations, holiday entertainment, etc.   This is not a hotel that caters to families/children.  The bathrooms do not have bathtubs.  We had to buy a plastic

Summary Heading: Clean and well taken care of
Summary: I stayed here for a week with my family. It is a really good alternative to the overpriced hotels in Laguna and it’s only 20 minutes to the beach. Clean rooms, great lobby ,staff was very helpful with wherever we needed.

Hotel is in a quiet area of Aliso Viejo and close to highway 73. Staff was friendly and helpful. Breakfast was very good, probably the best free breakfast I have experience. Some nights there is a free dinner as well, was told can be more like cheese and crackers some nights, but the night we were there, is was a very nice selection and included a salad bar and meatball sliders and included wine or beer. Did not use the pool but checked it one night and was well heated. Only feedback was they HVAC seems a bit loud, but not more than some other places I have stayed. I’m I picky traveler and plan to come back next time I’m in town. Only other place I have stayed in the area was the Ritz Carlton, which is also great but about 4 times more expensive.

My husband has Parkinson's.  I had requested a shower with grab bars for his safety and a room not on the first floor.  I called a few days before our arrival to confirm our request. Everything seemed to be ok.   The day before our arrival I called once again to confirm our request since experience has taught me that you need to follow up when a request is as important as safety issues.  The only handicap room available now was on the first floor.  When I indicated that this was not the agreement that was made a few days earlier the manager repeated a number of times that requests cannot be confirmed, even safety requests.  Upon arrival the room and hallway smelled of cigarette smoke.   Open food containers had been left in the cupboard.  I had requested NOT to have an adjoining

Hotel was clean and staff was extremely helpful and friendly.   Breakfast was again very good and cholces were more than I would have expected.  Area is within shopping plazas and local area is great for walking.

This is a little gem... offering breakfast and happy hour, along with a fully stocked (minus oven) kitchen.... if you have to be away from home during the thanksgiving holiday.... this is a pretty good home away from home

Summary Heading: Great property, services, and location for family
Summary: Stayed here once again for Thanksgiving. Staff is very friendly even despite the chaos during breakfast. Very clean rooms and lobby area. Nice little fitness center as well. Kids slept well and great value.

We hav stayed here 5 times. Enjoy the friendly staff, clean room, meals and the parking. They are helpful and I’m handicapped which they treated me with respect. Breakfast excellent with lots b of choices. Enjoy the fresh fruit. Evening social is tasty and fun.

Summary Heading: A Terrible Stay with No Heat and Shower
Summary: The heater in the suite room was just blowing cold air.  The staff of the front counter came up to check, but could not to fix.  She had to turn off the heater, so we stayed the whole night with no heating, and had to use all the blankets.  Then, we found the shower was broken, unable to pulling up the valve and no water came to the shower.  So we could not take shower.  We talked to the front counter again in the morning.  The staff apologized, and said would report to the manager.  She said the manager will contact us.  However, no one contacts me at all for three days.  I emailed to the hotel, but still get ignored,  This was the worst experience with a Hilton brand hotel, really a nightmare!  It really ruined my vacation.

Our stay here was at the tail end of a technical conference in San Diego, so our game plan was to see some old friends in Manhattan Beach, CA and then hike & explore Laguna Beach before flying back on Sunday.  We had looked at a map and found that the Homewood Suites would put us in a great location;  large mall within walking distance (Town Center), 10 miles from Crystal Cove State Park (via El Toro Road from Aliso Viejo), and Laguna Beach was just a few miles from Crystal Cove.  The hotel was a comfortable suite, very good bed, small kitchen, desk and large bathroom.    Parking was good, and right in front of the hotel with good lighting.  The secondary goal of staying here was to be close to California Route 73 in order to get back to the San Diego Airport early Sunday

Great location, comfortable bed, good breakfast, easy and free parking, fully equipped kitchen, good shower, very clean, lovely courtyard and pool area. Would stay here again if I ever visit this area again.

Summary Heading: Best around in its price range
Summary: The facility - As a newer facility this one stands out because it blends in so well with the local architecture. The pool and outside lounging areas are really quite nice and very comfortable. The local area is very walkable with really nice walking and jogging trails with magnificent views of the smog infested suburban nightmare that is Alisa Viejo.  The rooms - Modern, comfortable, and spacious.   The food - Significantly above expectations for hotels in this price range. They make a decent attempt at introducing some variety into the breakfast and dinner options as well has coming up with some more interesting snacking options than just dumping a bag of salad into a trough and putting out some bottles of grocery store dressing, which is common at other hotels in this chain

Summary Heading: Excellent. Would definitely stay here again.
Summary: My husband and I along with another couple stayed overnight. We were attending a Marine Ball. The Hotel is very nice. Loved the room, great breakfast and NO Parking Fee👍. Staff was very nice and they were all so great making special accomdation for us  due to our event schedule. The Hotel is in a great area. Will definitely stay here again. Thank you so much for the awesome service😊

The hotel changed my reservation and did not notify me of the change. I had confirmed a king size bed. They assigned me to a room with 2 smaller than usual full size beds with worn out and bumpy mattresses that were too short for anyone over 5"11. The beds were so bad, I could not sleep and ended up with a severe back ache. The only upside is that the following morning the manager apologized and did address the issue, unfortunately however the damage was already done.
Manager Response: Dear chasen67,  Thank you for your review. We’re sorry we didn’t provide the quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. We apologize that your room type was unavailable when you arrived and for the issues encountered in the room you received. We are working with our team to correct the problems you encountered and avoid recurrence going forward. Your feedback is genuinely helpful, as it is the first step in identifying areas where we can better our guest services. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll give us another chance to deliver an exceptional stay.

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay, nice big room
Summary: Stayed here a few times over the years, clean, quiet and good size room. The ability to pick a room before arrival is a plus, the evening social with free wine, beer and food makes it a free simple dinner!

I enjoyed my stay. Friendly staff; Good Food, Drinks & Amenities, Convenient Location. Was there on business and there were many areas to sit back and network or just relax. The only thing is I wish the bed was a little more comfortable. A little too hard for me.

Everything is brand new. Suite was wonderful. Complimentary breakfast had a lot of variety items way much more than a Continental breakfast and the evening social was absolutely fantastic after a long day of training!

The employees are very friendly and helpful. Tito especially took very good care of me and my colleagues during the check-in process. The rooms are also very nice and clean and the complimentary breakfast and dinner were amazing. This has been the best hotel experience I have ever had.

We flew in from out of state. Staff was very helpful with arranging transportation. Quiet, clean and close enough to drive into Laguna Beach or Crystal Cove in only minutes! I would love to do this again!

We visited this property during a Wedding stay along with many family members. The property was located about 15 minutes from wedding location. The grounds well kept and the staff were very accommodating and friendly. The rooms very spacious and came with a kitchen with plates and everything needed to prepare a meal. There were grocery stores near by and for the families with children that was a plus.   We enjoyed the patio, pool, jacuzzi it was very good. Now the complimentary breakfast lacked a little bit but was good as well.  Now the location you couldn’t ask for better. You will enjoy this property so much to do within a few minutes travel.

Summary Heading: Very good place to stay and the service is awesome so is the food. highly recommended . its gonna be my only stay
Summary: very good place to stay and the service is awesome so is the food . highly recommended . its gonna be my only stay when im in the area . close to alot good place and restaurant . very friendly staff. excellent  hotel

This is a beautiful property. The rooms are very clean. There is a full size fridge and microwave, which we found very useful traveling with a baby. I felt very safe in this area.  Breakfast was good the first day, and then the second day they offered chorizo sausage which was lukewarm and not yummy at all. They did not stock the breakfast items too efficiently the second day of our stay, but everything was great the first day when this tall gentlemen was also around greeting everyone and helping clear the plates. He was very friendly and provided great service.  The only thing that disappointed me was that they would not permit Late Checkout for us, even as Hilton honors members. When you're traveling on business with a baby, late check-out is essential for us, and we've stayed

My husband and I stayed here for a little weekend getaway and everything was great. The customer service was great and we were close to Laguna Beach restaurants and bars for a night out. Would definitely recommend and come again.

After a pin sized hole caused water damage and a huge headache in our home, we were going to be stuck at this hotel for longer than we expected. This hotel did everything to make it feel like home! Our room had a kitchen, pullout sofa for my younger kids, and two beds for the parents and our teenager. Free breakfast, evening snacks, bbq grill on property, and a short drive to restaurants and the movie theatre. If I had to complain about some things it would be mostly parking. We basically felt like we had a curfew, because if you get back anytime around midnight the parking lot is most likely full and you have to use their parking garage about a block away. I have to shout out two people specifically...Aaron who works the graveyard shift! The first time I had to park in the
Manager Response: Close2Jesus: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience of your stay. Thank you for choosing us as your home away from home while your home was being repaired. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed staying at our property, as well as the nearby amenities. It is absolutely our pleasure as a team to make sure that you feel safe and at home during your stay with us. Please come by and visit us anytime!  Sincerely, Kaylie Manville Guest Service Agent Homewood Suites by Hilton Aliso Viejo/Laguna Beach

Summary: Very good location. I really liked that there was shopping in walking distance. Plenty of guest parking. I appreciated the fridge in the room, large enough for my water and snacks, and kept my food cold.

I was on a leisure trip with my wife and stayed at the Homewood Suites - Aliso Viejo Laguna Beach and we were very impressed with the friendliness of the staff and the cleanliness of the rooms.  The outdoor patio with hot tub, pool, and fire pit were terrific amenities and was a perfect setting after a long day.

Everything was perfect. Clean, contemporary, spacious. Large gym, an actual BAR, outdoor area.. just great great, great!  And the printers work in the business area!  Business travelers (or family) definitely stay here!

Got a premiere suite and it was stocked with fruit, snacks, water, sodas and vitamin water and they restock it daily. There were two TVs in the room, a couch, table with chairs, coffee maker, fridge, microwave, stove and a large bed with extra pillows. It was a great stay with everything you would need. Staff and cleaners were nice, parking was easy, breakfast was fine and a good selection. We stayed on the second floor on the very end, it was quiet but we could hear people stomping around late one night on the floor above us so ask for the top floor. The pool is kinda small and gets crowded.

Great service and Amazing staff. The place is very clean and the rooms are spacious. Breakfast could be better tho. We had a great time with the family. We went to the beach which is about 20 mins away.

You can't help but feel at home with a kitchen. The staff were very pleasant and helpful. Our room was very clean and we appreciated the perfect coffee in the lobby all day and evening. We had a nice view of the mountains. It was a crystal clear pool and jacuzzi. A gym, and whoopee, a delicious complimentary breakfast. Real food with flavor. Our room only missing a safe. We did feel safe anyway. We did definitely recommend this hotel to friends and family.

Clean modern rooms.  Staff was extremely helpful and friendly, would love to stay again.  We stayed for our anniversary and the front desk offered us a bottle of wine to celebrate which was clearly above and beyond.
Manager Response: egleck: I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your accommodations and service while you were here with us. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, and thank you so much for choosing our property for your anniversary celebration. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!  Sincerely, Kaylie Manville Guest Service Agent Homewood Suites by Hilton Aliso Viejo/Laguna Beach

Summary: Our stay was a truly exceptional experience! Very friendly and helpful in all areas...front desk, hosts at complimentary buffet and housekeeping! We were going to celebrate our wedding anniversary at another Hilton property, but loved this one, so we will be back soon!

Stayed at this hotel four non-consecutive nights while my home was undergoing renovation in late August (in three different rooms on three different floors). Really impressed. Rooms, service were great,
Manager Response: Asenia2019: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience of your stay with us. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your service and accommodations, and thank you so much for choosing our property while your home was being renovated.

Summary: We live on Vantis and regularly hear happenings at the hotel pool.  Tonight it was very loud, late (unusual).  I called to ensure the party at the pool would be quiet by 10 PM.  I spoke with Tito who was beyond gracious.  Not only did he apologize (we were not anticipating that - not at all his fault) but the party quieted shortly after our call.  I called back to thank him and he was extremely respectful.  I really appreciate this behavior from hotel staff considering they’re our neighbors and based from Tito’s actions tonight, they care.  Thanks, Tito!
Manager Response: Molly M: I'm so pleased to hear that your issue with noise at the pool was resolved to your satisfaction. I'm thrilled to hear that you had such a great interaction with Tito, and I will make sure to let him know that you were happy with his service. Taking care of our neighbors is a high priority for us, please don't ever hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or concerns.   Sincerely,  Kaylie Manville Guest Service Agent Homewood Suites by Hilton Aliso Viejo

Summary Heading: Great in all aspects but lots of invoicing issues
Summary: Good location close to beaches, clean hotel with an exceptional housekeeping team. Front desk/management authorized double the total amount due on my Credit Card, the issue was not only concerning my room they maxed two platinum CC's on two other rooms occupied by family members.Hotel management did not take action for trying to charge double my rate even after showing them the confirmation for the booking, they adjusted the issue after speaking to them multiple times but still the rate was a bit higher than the confirmation email. They never reported the issue to Hilton as I had to do it for them, not even an apology came from them and they never tried to make it right. Other than the customer service experience by the front desk/hotel management on rates/over authorizing, the
Manager Response: Mr. Bukhari: Thank you once again for sharing your feedback of your stay. I am so glad that your family enjoyed your stay with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back upon your return to the area. In regards to your billing issues, please accept our sincerest apologies for any inconvenience. The refund and additional Hilton Honors points we discussed have been processed. Please let us know if you have any further questions or concerns.  Sincerely,  Kaylie Manville Guest Service Agent Homewood Suites by Hilton Aliso Viejo/Laguna Beach

Summary: Excellent service.  Good laundry room, nice complimentary breakfast and well appointed kitchen with full size refrigerator.  The main bed was great but the couch bed waa a saggy, lumpy uncomfortable mess.

Summary Heading: Wrong charges on my credit card
Summary: Was over charged at checkout and the hotel was not able to help. We originally booked through Hilton honors with points and upon arrival they did not see my reservation. It took 30 minutes to correct. Upon checkout they still charged me to full amount of the room.

Summary Heading: Excellent Stay - all areas were rock solid.
Summary: This is a great hotel overall and you are 15 minutes from Laguna Beach and within 20 minutes from main PCH Orange county beaches. Overall, I would recommend. Food selection needs a little bit improvement (only qualm).

Summary Heading: Excellent place for a business trip stay
Summary: The room was spacious and clean, the hotel staff was friendly, and the location was just a few miles away from work.  I felt right at home and enjoyed my stay here.  The evening social was an added plus.

Summary Heading: Nice little gem in South Orange County!
Summary: I was so surprised by how well appointed and roomy this studio (suite) was.  Probably one of the nicest hotels I've stayed at.  The complimentary evening social and breakfast were convenient and enough food that we didn't have to leave to get food.  The room looked and felt very clean.  Will definitely stay there again while in So Cal.

It was very pleasent we still haven’t reciecved our hold deposit for our room though. The pool area was nice & hot tub temp was extremely hot though. Bar drinks were very pricey considering the size & quality.

Summary Heading: Definitely a great place to stay
Summary: I would definitely stay here again. The complimentary breakfast and evening social kept costs down on food. It was wonderful having access to complimentary coffee and tea service 24hrs a day Free parking definitely a plus.

I stayed here for 10 nights in June 2019.  Great location about 10 minutes from my office in Irvine and 10-15 minutes to Laguna Beach.  There is a large plaza at the bottom of the hill (~10 minute walk or 2 minute drive) with plenty of restaurants, bars, a movie theater, and a Trader Joe's.  Complimentary breakfast was excellent and there is also an evening social hour with snacks and beer/wine included from Monday-Thursday.  The pool was very nice and quiet most days and the fitness center was well equipped (although one of the two exercise bikes was not functioning).  Room was very spacious and comfortable and really did feel like a home away from home with a full kitchen, living room, and separate bedroom/bathroom.    I only had 2 small issues with my stay and the staff was

Summary Heading: Best Hotel in the Mission Viejo Area.  Hands Down!
Summary: The front desk manager and her staff is the best.  She too very goo care of us.  Good is great and close to great attractions.  My new west coast lodging without question!  We arrived early and the staff upgraded me to a room so my family would not have to wait.
Manager Response: abngambler: I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that you were able to enjoy nearby attractions with your family. It was our pleasure to provide you with a room upgrade, and we look forward to welcoming you back upon your return to the area!  Sincerely,  Kaylie Manville Guest Service Agent Homewood Suites by Hilton Aliso Viejo/Laguna Beach

Summary: Everything was excellent, except the breakfast sausage.  Wish the complimentary evening social was available every evening.  Wish there were more restaurants within 5-10 minute walking distance.  Love the spacious room.
Manager Response: kiwi826: I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and accommodations with us, as well as our evening social. Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback of your experience. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Sincerely, Kaylie Manville Guest Service Agent Homewood Suites by Hilton Aliso Viejo/Laguna Beach

Summary: Stayed for my son's soccer tournament with his team. We had an excellent stay- the room was spacious, clean, had a well-stocked kitchen, enough outlets, & even had different types of charging cables. Pool area was perfect with many tables so all the parents were able to socialize while the kids used the pool. There was a very decent bar area. Overall a very nice hotel & stay!

This was a small hotel but super cute. Check in was very fast and easy and yiu don’t even need to check out.  Complimentary breakfast was convenient. Eggs and potatoes were rather tasteless but they have many other options like waffles, pastries, oatmeal and fruit. All hotel staff members we were in contact with were VERY nice!  Room was clean and spacious.

Parking is at a premium at this property.  If there are no parking spaces you have to park a block away and walk back to the hotel no matter the time of day or night.  We got in from a professional baseball game, no parking but was told I had to park a block away at another location and walk back at 0130 (1:30 AM).  Safety is a serious issue.
Manager Response: kaelin2573: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience of your stay. Your feedback in regards to your safety and security during your time here is extremely valuable to us, and we are so sorry if parking was an inconvenience to you in any way. We will certainly pass on your concerns onto management as we look to improve guest experience in regards to this matter. We hope you will consider staying with us again in the future.   Sincerely, Kaylie Manville  Guest Service Agent Homewood Suites by Hilton Aliso Viejo/Laguna Beach

Summary: We flew in for a family event and chose this hotel as it seemed close and comfortable.   Wonderful place, the room was spacious, beds very comfortable and the staff pleasant and gracious.  On the weekend when the breakfast area was busy, we were very impressed to see the desk staff jumping in to assist.  We won't hesitate to stay there again.
Manager Response: Barbara S: Thank you so much for sharing your experience of your stay with us. I am thrilled to hear that our location and our accommodations exceeded your expectations for your family visit to the area. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!  Sincerely,  Kaylie Manville Guest Service Agent Homewood Suites By Hilton Aliso Viejo

Summary Heading: First stay with Homewood Suites, will keep us staying with them in the future.
Summary: We were very impressed with our stay!  The staff was great and the room met all our needs.  The hotel, parking, and grounds were well maintained.  We will definitely look for Homewood Suites in our future travels.
Manager Response: Carl D: Thank you so much for your positive review of our property, and for choosing us for your stay in the area. We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with our staff and our accommodations. We look forward to welcoming you back when your travels bring you to this area again.   Sincerely,  Kaylie Manville Guest Service Agent Homewood Suites By Hilton Aliso Viejo/Laguna Beach

Summary Heading: The best place to stay in Aliso Viejo
Summary: The rooms are spacious and the staff that tidies them up is happy to deal with as The employees at Homewood do their jobs professionally and happily. The breakfast (daily) is very good with hot and cold items served with a helpful staff. Monday-Thursday they do an amazing happy hour that serves enough food that it has become our dinner most nights along with wine and beer. The attention to detail all employees make a high effort with guests is quite remarkable. Our two week stay was amazing. You won't go wrong if on business or pleasure with family (pool, etc.) as all the employees are customer oriented in providing excellent service.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience and for choosing our property! It was our pleasure to provide you with friendly service, and we're so glad to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary hot breakfast and evening social. I hope that you will stay with us again if your travels bring you back to the area.

Summary: Drove from Phoenix and while we found the initial room small, Hector and the GM were able to upgrade us to a larger and much more convenient suite. This turned a tired family into one that was shown the value Hilton places on its guests.  The breakfast was a great way to start the day, with a solid blend of food varieties.

My stay at Homewood Suites was great. From the location to the employees to the hotel everything was nice. I came to this hotel on business & this has been one of the nicest hotel our company has put us at.

Great location, nice size rooms, good service, comfy beds & excellent value.  If you are looking for a good place to stay in OC without breaking the bank would highly recommend Homewood Suites in Aliso Viejo.

A great hotel with a very friendly staff Amenities were excellent and the overall quality of the facility was top notch- I would recommend to anyone staying in this area, surprisingly great value for money

They have a good breakfast, employers are so kind and the bedroom was big that I expect, clean and I could cook. Social areas are great. I loved the fireplace. I didn't use the pool and Jacuzzi but looked clean and safe

Summary Heading: Great area, clean and spacious hotel
Summary: We came here for a basketball tournament at the Ladera Ranch Sports Center. The area is beautiful. All new and clean. Plenty of places to shop and eat at. Easy to get to from highway. Hotel was clean, breakfast was plenty, staff was friendly, rooms are very large and big.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Orange County
Summary: Wonderful hotel for our family's stay in Orange country.  Staff are super friendly and made us feel welcome.  The breakfast and evening social were great and helped us stay on budget.  Would definitely stay again.

Loved the location and Homewood Suites always meets my expectations. Slight problem with overbooking my room type reserved but they solved the problem and accommodated my needs. Will definitely comeback.

My husband and I were celebrating our 25th Wedding Anniversary. The check-in process was very stressful. Make sure the hotel's computer is accurate with charges to the customer. My experience in the past with hotels is that the deposit is held at check in (not the deposit and total cost of the room). The payment transaction is complete upon checkout and the deposit hold is released. My experience was very bad since the hotel 1) Said my transaction was declined, staff asked for another card which I did not have. Staff also asked if they could charge 1 night stay since their computer showed transaction was declined. If the staff would've tried to charge 1 night stay, that would've been a total of $585.50 2) My checking account showed a pending transaction (amount was unavailable)

The rooms are beautiful and clean. The staff is helpful and kind. Complimentary breakfast and happy hour helped to make our stay extra special. Elevator was a little creaky, so if that freaks you out you may wanna request a room on the 1st floor.

Very Clean and comfortable room  it was very spacious. Great complimentary breakfast with great choices. Pool area was clean and had plenty of seating had a fire pit with lights and comfortable sofas would stay again.

We spent 3 nights at this hotel and found their front desk staff to be excellent. They greeted us each time we entered and exited and mingled professionally with guests during the weekly happy hours. They were also very responsive to requests. Upon checkout, they asked about our stay and our plans for the day. The personal touch was much appreciated.

Visited hotel in March 2019 with my wife and two children (ages 3 and 1) the experience my family and I had at this hotel was fantastic. All of the staff was very friendly, courteous, and helpful whenever needed. The room was always cleaned promptly, even if we needed it done later in the afternoon. The attention to detail with all services was refreshing and appreciated. The next time we are in the area, we will definitely be staying at this hotel again and will recommend to family and friends.

Summary Heading: New property with spacious, well-designed rooms...
Summary: We were attending an event in Newport, which lacks Hilton properties, so we decided to stay a little further south. This property is new and well-appointed, with comfortable, well-designed rooms. We had a great stay here for 5 days, but there are a few things I wish I’d known. The drive to Newport is quick, beautiful, and stress-free if you take the nearby toll road. The alternate routes are problematic, so pay the tolls. This property caters to business travelers, and breakfast ends at 9:00 am on weekdays. I noticed several hangry guests after 9:00, so plan accordingly. The happy hour buffet is wonderful and could easily sub for a meal, so that helps make up for it. Parking is free and convenient, and just down the hill is a multitude of restaurants and shopping centers.

Summary Heading: Probably OK for Business but NOT Vacations
Summary: I’ll start by saying that this is a nice hotel.  The public areas are well maintained and very pleasant.  The suites have everything you would expect at a Homewood Suites.  The check in staff were very professional and pleasant.  I would add that there are several bars & restaurants a short drive or (for us) 20 minutes walk away.  My problem was that we were on vacation/holiday and here breakfast stops on the dot at 9am.  The business people had gone to work by then and we made sure we were down by 8:45 each morning.  At 9am the door to the breakfast area was closed and a member of staff was turning guests away.  That was horrible to see and obviously left several guests disappointed.

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay with Homewood Suites Aliso Viejo Laguna Beach. The neighborhood was quiet, yet close to many amenities. The hotel staff was extremely friendly, the complementary  breakfast was decent, and the evening social was very much appreciated.  Overall great experience...highly recommend!

The hotel was very clean and organized. High quality costumer service provided by the front desk. For breakfast there was a good selection of options. Our kids really enjoy our stay and we would definitely return there again.

To say the least, this was a horrible experience. I was very disappointed and dissatisfied with the entire experience. If there would have been better response to all the issues, it could've been Okay

Our family of seven stayed here last year in January while on vacation and we liked it so much that we decided to stay again this year. Newer, modern, clean, pool, jacuzzi, nice staff, complimentary breakfast and bar!

Summary Heading: Over the top when it comes to comfort and service
Summary: I guess you could say I am an expert here as a guest of this home away from home that I have resided here for nearly 3 months since being flooded out of my home. I was impressed with the spacious room of at least 660 sq ft, larger than any other suite for extended stay as I am still here. The breakfast served is adequate and the staff is the most friendly I have ever experienced both in the dining area as well as the housekeeping area not to forget the front desk and management. They have gone out of their way to provided added comfort to my mattress with a gel infused comforter and I will never forget all their efforts as I feel like part of the familiar faces since my home is extending to at least 5 months.

Very nice suites. Clean and neat, like having our own apartment. Good breakfast with a nice variety of foods to choose from. Happy Hour should be extended through the weekend though. Overall experience was great.

This is a comfortable and clean place to stay. Very helpful and friendly staff. Nothing was too much trouble. I would highly recommend this hotel to anybody, whether you are looking for a place to stop for business (evening socials were great) or a family friendly stay. Great location!

Summary Heading: Our primary hotel destination for Orange County, CA
Summary: Our family of 5 loves to stay here because you get access to prime OC attractions within a few miles radius, they have a pull out sofa-bed that our kids sleep in, and great breakfast. Highly recommended!

Summary Heading: Lots of amenities, breakfast and complimentary dinner and drinks on weeknights.
Summary: Clean hotel conveniently located near many restaurants (Macaroni Grill, Opah Seafood, a brewpub, Buffalo Wild Wings, Urban Kitchen) and Trader Joes and Wallgreens.  It's about a fifteen minute drive to Laguna Beach so it's an uber ride or drive from there.  The only issue we had was our shades were motorized and unfortunately broken.  We could not open them during our stay which prevented us from seeing the Southern California Sun!  Staff explained that parts for shade we're missing, etc, but otherwise were friendly and helpful.

Summary Heading: Wonderful accomondations, you won't be disappointed
Summary: Clean, modern, well appointed.  Kitchen was a big bonus.  We ordered carryout late one night from Porky's pizza, delivered right to the room and we had actual plates and flatware in the room, as well as a dishwasher.  Comfortable bed with a pull out sofa sleeper.  Housekeeping service was terrific.   Would definitely stay here again.

This hotel was perfectly located and great staff. Good service and great atmosphere . The transportation need to be better for incoming clients for convenience. More variety of food preferences, great social menu and company

Had a great night at this property in SoCal.  - Bar - This Homewood Suites has a nice bar that stays open until 10:00.  - Rooms - Rooms are up to date and quiet.  - Gym - Gym was solid with all of the treadmills working. Really nice night at this property.

Summary Heading: Great hotel and location at a good price
Summary: Hotel is situated in a community with all the services, populated by high-tech companies and young professional people. The area is very nice and well planned, it even has forest areas. Location is good with access to main freeways. Property is clean, rooms are ample and well equipped. Breakfast is OK, and it can be improved.

The pictures don’t do this place justice. You need to stay here to appreciate it. The area is perfect, literally can walk to everything you need from grocery shopping to restaurants, clothes shopping, dessert, movies and more. Plus everything is super clean so great for the entire family. Then the rooms are perfect . I will gladly stay again.

Our property recently had a re-pipe renovation and we booked 5 rooms at the Homewood Suites by Hilton for our residents. The staff was absolutely amazing. Very friendly and accommodating. Not to mention the rooms were HUGE and the free breakfast super! It's a home away from home.  I really want to give a BIG thanks to Jerilyn Branco, Director of Sales, for being so prompted with paperwork and reservations (some that we made at the last minute). Also, for giving us an awesome deal in price. Thank you to all for a wonderful stay! We will definitely book at this Hotel for any future needs from our residents.

Spacious, clean room with no noises making it easy to sleep.   There was access to breakfast daily and dinner  Monday through Thursday including beer and wine with dinner. Very attentive staff kept tables clean and were very friendly.

I love this Homewood Suites. The staff is always accommodating, very friendly, and go out of their way to make your stay ...with a smile on their faces. I’m impressed and will be back again. Strongly consider staying here.

Service was good.  No complaints with that.  Did not know that all the suites did not have bath tubs, so was a bit disappointed with that. No major issues.  Was not able to connect to the internet, so I had to use my personal cell as a hot spot.  Internet service could definitely use a revamp for ease of use.

Summary Heading: Very impressed with first time at this hotel
Summary: I've stayed at the nearby Marriott several times.  I wanted to try to Homewood Suites to take advantage the kitchen in the King Suite.  It was great!  The King Suite is well laid out and roomy, and the kitchen, with full refrigerator was perfect.  I really liked that there was no charge for parking.

Summary Heading: Excellent Suite Stay near the So. Cal Beaches
Summary: Stayed at this location (Aliso Viejo) in late December (26th-30th), for an extended family visit.   This location is top notch and the whole experience from beginning to end was great.  I found this property to be very well managed and all employees were all very friendly and professional. We had a very nice room with a full kitchenette.  Room was nice, clean, quiet and comfortable.   Nice free Hot Breakfast and Social Hour also included in stay.   This location is also very close to the beach and Dana Point Harbor (about 15 minutes down surface streets to the beach areas).  No getting on freeways to visit those areas.  A big plus !     I would definitely stay at this property on my next visit to this area.  Great value and customer service. signed  Tucson, AZ Traveler

This was our second time staying at this property. We love the location as it is only a 3 minute drive to our friends' house and the reason we come to Aliso Viejo. We returned to this location because of location and cleanliness.
