All was going well, until the day before New Years Eve when we received a notice that the cleaning staff would not be available to clean our room on New Years Day as they had the day off. The notice further stated that if we wanted our room cleaned and fresh towels, we would have to contact the front desk staff on New Years Eve and advise them that we wanted the room cleaned. I called down to the from desk at 10:00 am. I was advised that the cleaning staff would be sent right up. I proceeded to leave the hotel to run errands, and did not return until

Arrived and was welcomed. Inviting foyer and checking desk. We were informed of the breakfast, social, and pool/hot tub hours. The patio’s and pool area were clean and easily accessible with pleasant gardens.

Summary Heading: Modern,clean, spacious rooms for great price
Summary: Stayed one night.  Hotel caters to longer term residents.  Bar is small but service was great.  Desk clerk was extremely nice and efficient considering how busy he was.  Room was clean and well designed.  Great for families or business.

Hotel was very clean and comfortable. We had to catch a flight from LAX the next day and the drive was surprisingly quick. The breakfast lady was fantastic and very friendly. Would stay again if in the area.

Summary Heading: New facility, great location, excellent staff and accommodations!
Summary: We reserved several rooms for this trip and we arrived with a large group who needed to be ready for a wedding pre-dinner in a few short hours.  However, upon arrival we were informed that the reservation and check-in system was off-line and “traditional” check-in would not be available for up to a couple of hours.  This unfortunate glitch with your computer system gave the hotel staff the chance to shine and show off their customer service skills.  They were very professional, apologized for the inconvenience, accommodated us with a manual check in, walked us to our rooms, and then later confirmed with us our check-in status after the system was back online.  The included breakfast was as good as I've had for a no-extra-charge perk and included several hot items, a waffle
Manager Response: Dear Chris C,  Thank you so much for taking the time to choose our property to host your family and for sharing your experience with our prospective guests. We truly appreciate your patience with us through our system error. We are so pleased to read that your improved mightily from there. We are glad to read you all were able to take advantage of our a few of our amenities and food offerings. It was an honor to host and serve you and your family for your big weekend. We cannot express how much your words to mean to our team. Whether it be for a wedding or a disney trip, we will all be looking forward to having you all again here soon.   Sincerely,  Nicholas Houck Front Office Manager Homewood Suites Aliso Viejo nick.houck@hilton.com

Summary: This is a very well kept and maintained hotel. The free breakfast at this hotel is absolutely out of this world delicious and tasty. The front desk personnel and housekeeping were friendly and very accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear Jhonesnaps60,  Thank you so much for choosing our property and for taking the time to share your experience with our prospective guests. We are so pleased to read that you enjoyed your visit to our hotel and were able to take advantage of our delicious complimentary breakfast. We truly appreciate your kind words with regards to our front desk and housekeeping. It means a great deal to us all! We look forward to hosting you again at our property soon.   Happy New Year,  Nicholas Houck Front Office Manager Homewood Suites Aliso Viejo nick.houck@hilton.com

Summary: Our family was very impressed with this hotel accommodations, service, location and everything exceeded our expectations! No need to pay Laguna Beach rates when you can stay here 15 min away at Aliso.
Manager Response: Dear Flyer26993370611,  Thank you so much for choosing our property and for sharing your feedback with prospective guests. We are so pleased to read about your experience here with us. We appreciate you highlighting our tremendous value and proximity to Laguna Beach. We look forward to welcoming you all back to our property again soon.  Happy Holidays to you all,  Nicholas Houck Front Office Manager Homewood Suites Aliso Viejo - Laguna Beach nick.houck@hilton.com

Summary: Nice location, close to places to eat. Rooms very spacious and clean, nice selection at breakfast with both hot and cold options. Nightly reception with good food and drinks (beer and wine). Cookies at front desk each night an added plus.
Manager Response: Dear kjturgeon,  Thank you so much for choosing our property and for sharing your experience with our prospective guests. We are so pleased to see that you were able to take advantage of both our breakfast, evening social and our most delicious cookies! We truly appreciate your kind words and your business. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Sincerely,  Nicholas Houck Front Office Manager Homewood Suites Aliso Viejo  nick.houck@hilton.com

Summary: Perfect stay with the family for a family wedding. Made us feel very at ease. Best place!! We had the hairdresser and photographer come to the hotel and they treated them with respect. The employees are the best at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Rhea C,  Thank you so much for choosing our property and for sharing your experience with our prospective guests. We are so touched by your kind words and are so pleased to see that everyone enjoyed their experience. Our team members take so much pride in being able to provide only the highest quality service possible. We hope you all had a beautiful time at the wedding. We look forward to having you all back to our property again soon!  Sincerely,  Nicholas Houck Front Office Manager Homewood Suites Aliso Viejo nick.houck@hilton.com

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with a two year old. The king suite was perfect.
Summary: Great place to stay with a two year old. The king suite was perfect.  Kiddo went to sleep in separate room while parents got to enjoy a little downtime.  Breakfast was average but it was complimentary. Little one was happy with choices even though dad wasn't.
Manager Response: Dear Sightsee38909061390,  Thank you so much for choosing our property and for sharing your experience with our prospective guests. We are so thrilled to read about your experience with our accommodations in our King Suites. We will work with our breakfast team to make the proper adjustments to provide more choices. Thank you again for sharing your feedback. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back to our property soon!  Sincerely,  Nicholas Houck Front Office Manager Homewood Suites Aliso Viejo nick.houck@hilton.com

Summary: Nice facility, good area, plenty of stores nearby, 15 mins to the mall, 20 mins to the ocean - hw73 is a toll road, but plenty of alternatives to getting around - bar area very social in the evenings ...
Manager Response: Dear Enigmausly,  Thank you so much for choosing our property and for sharing your feedback with our prospective guests.. We are so pleased to read that you were able to take advantage of our hotel's location and proximity to all of the sites. We hope you are able to enjoy our complimentary evening social as well. We look forward to welcoming you back for your next visit. I hope you have a fantastic rest of your week.  Sincerely,  Nicholas Houck Front Office Manager Homewood Suites Aliso Viejo nick.houck@hilton.com

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a nice location.
Summary: Great, new hotel in a nice location with excellent amenities at a reasonable price. The studious are roomy, clean and we'll equipped. The complimentary breakfast is very good and the AAA discount reduces even further the reasonable price.
Manager Response: Dear dimflp,  Thank you so much choosing our property and for sharing your feedback with our prospective guests. We are so thrilled to read about your visit with us. We are so glad you were able to take advantage of our AAA discount and enjoy our complimentary breakfast. We hope you join us again if your travels take your through this area. We look forward to welcoming you back to our property soon. I hope you have a wonderful rest of your week!  Sincerely,  Nicholas Houck Front Office Manager Homewood Suites Aliso Viejo nick.houck@hilton.com

Summary Heading: Great hotel/ value ... great customer service ... Inadequate parking
Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights at Thanksgiving.  Got a great AAA rate of $107/night for a room King Bed Studio with a full kitchen.  Quality breakfast.  Never able to park in the hotel parking lot due to inadequate number of spaces. Very disappointing. Parked a few blocks away in overflow parking structure.
Manager Response: Dear BoardingPass45748,  Thank you so much for choosing our property and for sharing your experience with our prospective guests. We are so pleased to see that you were able to get such a fantastic rate and were able to enjoy our breakfast! We are sorry to read of your experience with our parking lot. Since our lot is a complimentary lot, we do not limit the number of vehicles each guest takes to the hotel. We are hoping to have relief to the current parking situation in the new year. We really appreciate your kind words and your business. We look forward to welcoming you back soon,  Sincerely,  Nicholas Houck Front Office Manager Homewood Suites Aliso Viejo nick.houck@hilton.com

Summary: From the minute we walked in Tito was excellent-he was informative and hospitable. We loved the BBQ and the kitchenette.  Not only personable, he was sincere, genuine, and made our getaway delightful! With this being said, we wanted to recognize his exceptional customer service !
Manager Response: Dear 246alinam,  Thank you so much for choosing our property and for sharing your experience with our prospective guests. We are so thrilled to read about the time you all had at our property with Tito. Tito truly exemplifies the meaning of distinguished hospitality. We are so pleased to see that you were able to enjoy our BBQ as well as our kitchenettes. We look forward to hosting you at our property again in the future.   Sincerely,  Nicholas Houck Front Office Manager Homewood Suites Aliso Viejo nick.houck@hilton.com

Summary Heading: Best choice in town for the value
Summary: For ten days we had to go to a different hotel (more expensive) that caused me and family depression.  The hotel was like a 1970's casino with a funny smell and dry personnel.  My family forced me to go back to Homewood Suites which was a pleasure.Thank you,
Manager Response: Dear Benjamin K,  Thank you so much for choosing our property and for sharing your experience with our prospective guests. It was an absolute pleasure hosting your family and getting to know you all. We were all so happy to have you all back once more. We hope you all have settled back in at home and are doing well. We truly appreciate your kind words and hope to see you all again soon.   Sincerely,  Nicholas Houck Front Office Manager Homewood Suites Aliso Viejo nick.houck@hilton.com

Summary: Great place to stay. Location is nice. I stated rooms as a 4 Star due to being given 2nd floor. Would have liked a room high up on the 4th. I paid the one bedroom suite. Have a 4 Star in value die to price. $221 and you think you would be placed in the highest floor to appreciate the higher level views. Overall stay was nice for one night.

The facilities are nice and the staff is wonderful. They serve breakfast daily and dinner Monday through Thursday.  The facilities are close to disney and the beach. The cleaning staff is nice but not detailed. The mattresses are not very comfortable but not the worst.
Manager Response: Dear JenniferG3658,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience and for choosing our property. We deeply apologize for the lapse in detail you found with our housekeeping staff and the lack of quality you had in your sleep. We will work with our team to ensure that we refine the details in each and every inch of our facilities. We truly appreciate your kind words with regards to our staff. We hope if your travels take you back through this area that you would give us another chance. Thank you again for allowing us to have the opportunity to host and serve you. I hope you have a fantastic rest of your week.   Sincerely,  Nicholas Houck nick.houck@hilton.com Front Office Manager Homewood Suites Aliso Viejo

Summary: I was quite impressed with this property. The staff was friendly and attentive. When I asked for a lightbulb  for a misting lamp they came right away to install it. The suites were lovely. The breakfast offered with the price of the room was full of variety. And there is tea and coffee offered to guests 24 seven.     I was pleasantly surprised at the availability of parking with a lot all to itself especially since this is Southern California where parking is challenging.   Security was good with electronics keys.    If I have one complaint it was at the pool furniture at a few stains on it but the decor was lovely. I was also a little surprised about the sign they had posted on the door entering the pool, which I put in the pictures.  I Thought one of the main signs might be to

Stayed for 2 nights in a 2 queen studio suite. Room was clean and spacious with a kitchenette. Our room faced the road, but barely heard traffic/cars going by. Located in a residential/business area, however, a 5-10 min drive to local shopping plazas if you need a bite to eat or shop. Complimentary breakfast consists of a selection of fruit, danishes, bagels, hot oatmeal, cereal, eggs, sausage, etc and waffle maker. There’s always refreshments of coffee, tea and water in the lobby. Staff was very friendly. This hotel is perfect for business travelers and families.

From the Amazing breakfast to the social hour that gives you a chance to meet fellow guests and just relax, this location is a 5 star place to stay.  Full kitchen makes it easy to eat healthy and have your own meals.

Homewood Suites by Hilton was a great hotel and a great location.  Everything about the was great.  It is a newer hotel with 2018 accommodations.  Breakfast was very good with a good variety to choose from.  Thank you.

Family stayed here as temporary housing for two months. The staff were really friendly and courteous, every single day we were there. The room was very comfortable and clean. Breakfast was always delicious. It was close excellent restaurant, parks and stores.

Summary Heading: Great rooms, but a bit noisy
Summary: I liked this hotel overall. The room was clean, modern, and very spacious. It had a nice sized kitchen with a full sized fridge. The bedroom, living room was large and open. The bathroom had a great shower. The free hot breakfast was good. Strong coffee!    The only issue I had was how much you could hear your neighbors. The room above had someone walking around a lot and it was as loud as thunder. We could also hear the people in the room next door talking and it didnt seem like they were talking loudly. It was hard to sleep because the level of noise transfer.   I liked this hotel a lot, I would just wish it had been built with a little more noise dampening.

This was a real find.  A hotel with the friendliest staff, great room and food!  M-Th they offer "snacks" to guests.  I had an Angus beef hamburger, nor exactly a snack, with choices of fries, salads and fruit.  Dinner for the guests.  I couldn't imagine eating a more filling meal.  Breakfasts were just ok because the eggs were cold both days we were there. But the rest of breakfast was good and ample. There was a full kitchen and fridge in the room which we never used and a comfortable place to work with wifi etc.  We would not hesitate to stay there again.

We stayed here for an extended stay recently and are quite pleased.  The hotel is newer and very nice, as well as a convenient location in Aliso Viejo.  The staff is very friendly and they offer a nicely done breakfast and lite dinner with beer and wine.   Clean and quite tasty.  They even have chocolate chip cookies (sometimes) in the lobby.   I stay at Hilton properties, Homewood Suites, quite often and I think this is one of the best. We had a slight issue during our stay and the manager I spoke with was professional and helpful to resolve the issue to my satisfaction.   If you’re in the area this is a great place to stay.

So... I wanted to write this review because I was truly happy with this hotel.  Having seen it had some of the highest reviews of places in OC, I had high hopes.    The Good - Clean - Friendly staff - Coffee/water provided in the lobby.  (Big Customer Service Plus for me!) - A few things for my kids to play with outside the dining area to keep them occupied.  More hotels should think of doing this. - Quiet, overall. - The pool area was nice. - Parking was convenient.   - Our room has a full sized frig. - Good amount of seating for the breakfast rush. - Good selection of food for breakfast.  Improvements - Our room wasn't ready when our family of five (3 toddlers) arrived at 3:30.  I had to be somewhere at 4:30, so we opted to take a room with just a king bed instead of two

Summary Heading: Great Hotel-staff very professional yet friendly
Summary: Great Hotel and great price. Our room was clean, modern and spacious. Breakfast was yummy - The pool was never overly busy during our stay and we enjoyed this facility. We were really impressed! We will be back!

Centrally located minutes from I-5, this hotel has a beautiful demographics located minutes from the scenic cliffside views of Laguna Beach, Irvine Spectrum, Disney and sports venues. They served breakfast and dinner, breakfast was better just being honest.... Very clean, hositable with Neutrogena bathroom soap/shampoo. Nice clean fitness room, heated and I do mean heated jacuzzi with a nice pool. Small store also within hotel.

I was visiting Laguna Beach on a girls trip and this hotel was the perfect place to stay.  I got rocked by some waves at Aliso Viejo Beach and had severe sand burns and Olga, with a strange recommendation, actually helped the burns! (Sour Cream... who knew?!).  Thank you so much for such a wonderful experience!  We're already planning our next girls trip to come back!!!

An amazing hotel and awesome service, with a great professional staff - the complimentary breakfast was a huge convenience for us and always spot on delicious every day.  Would love to enjoy the hotel once again under leisure circumstances.

Great room, decor and facility!   Especially enjoyed the jacuzzi after a long day!  Would highly recommend to anyone wanting to visit Laguna or Newport Beach.   It’s off the beaten path but definitely still close to everything!

Summary Heading: Great experience! We’ll DEFINITELY stay again!
Summary: This was one of the best hotels stays we have ever experienced! Great free food and INCREDIBLE service. Very closely located to everything you want to do. The staff is the BEST! So nice and helpful and go out of their way to make your stay great.

this is an extraordinary hotel. the staff are committed to customer service. the hotel room was immaculate in cleanliness and well laid out for business and relaxation. the only problem i encountered was parking - the parking lot is simply not big enough. nonetheless, the staff helped me by parking me in a special place that was wonderful.

I have stayed at this property several times and it is better than ever.  The breakfast is wonderful and the staff is likewise.  The evening social with food is truly upgraded with a full good selection meal served Monday through Thursday.  The social staff is very accommodating and the best.  Definitely highly recommend.

Summary Heading: Convenient location - Nice Hotel - Worth The Price
Summary: We stayed at the Homewood Suites Aliso Viejo for ten days while waiting for our furniture to arrive at our home rental. The location is convenient as it is within 20 minutes or so from Laguna Beach / Newport Beach / Irvine Spectrum Center but doesn't have that industrial / urban city location feel that you kind of get near the airport. The staff is great. Tito was always going out of his way to help in any way possible. The morning free breakfast is good and the seating area is comfortable and relaxed. The rooms are large, have a kitchenette and have clean, contemporary feel. I definitely would stay here again if in the area.

Our family stayed at this property during our road trip through California.  The property was clean, bright, nicely decorated, and had well appointed suites.  The pool, patio, and fire pit areas were very nice, and we enjoyed the time we spent relaxing in these common areas.  The complimentary breakfast was also very satisfying with a good variety of items including yogurt, fruit, cereal, eggs, fresh waffles, etc.  It was an easy 10 minute ride to the beach and downtown shopping areas was also close to some other shopping centers that offered pharmacies, Starbucks, etc.  Would definitely recommend this property.

Great hotel with excellent service.  Staff was fantastic and very helpful.  The breakfast was very good.  Rooms were excellent. Food was quite good.  The best thing really was the staff.  We were very pleased with their entire team.

I selected this hotel based on reviews, location and price point. I was not disappointed this property was amazing my room was clean, spacious and felt brand new.  The only issue I had was parking other then that this property gets 5 stars from me. I loved it and will absolutely stay there agian. I 100% recommend this place to whoever is reading this.

Great location, lots of restaurants and shops near. The rooms and all common areas were clean. The hot breakfast offered any different options and the food was good. The hotel & staff exceeded our expectations. Will definitely stay here again.

I stayed at this hotel at least about once per month for over a year. I always felt welcomed by the staff. The place is kept very clean. Their social evenings area great for the busy traveler who needs a small and quick bite at night. They have all the amenities needed for a multi day stay. I would definitely keep staying at this hotel in future visits.

We stayed here in a 2 bedroom suite which was huge. Apart from the 2 large bedrooms, both with ensuite bathrooms, there was also a another room where we could all sit and relax. Everything was clean, the beds comfortable, the shower area great. It was also quiet where we were. Breakfast was a small buffet with fresh fruit, juice, cooked dishes, cereal, other assorted goodies. The pool and jacuzzi area was very nice. I still managed to do some laps even though the pool was small. The staff  were great, very helpful, especially Sally in the front desk and Juan the pool guy who helped me with a small problem. It is about 15 minutes to the beach, but a great place to stay. My friends are quite picky and they all thought it was great too. The elevators are an interesting experience.

First time i stayed at this hotel. Great customer service. Rooms are very nice and clean. Manager was very accommodating. I would definitely stay there again.   Breakfasr was very nice and bar open at night.

The location is near the shopping area and easy to walk to. The hotel is clean and upkeep is taken serious- which is always nice. I stayed here for several weeks during a business trip, and the rooms are clean, with a little kitchenette and full size fridge. WiFi worked well in the rooms and staff are very friendly and helpful. They changed out my feather pillows for foam pillows, so I slept like baby. I would stay again, if back in the area.

Summary Heading: Nice Property but some details need reexamining
Summary: Very clean, modern facility with a nice layout and lots of amenities.  Parking is an issue when returning late at night - there is a sea of parking around the property but it is signed no parking.  Also, the hide-a-bed is not recommended - it was substandard even for a hide-a-bed.
Manager Response: Dear PepperBlaze,  Thank you so much for choosing our property and for sharing your experience with our prospective guests! As you highlighted our complimentary parking lot does tend to fill up during our peak season weekends. While we cannot permit guests to park in front of the local businesses, we do have an overflow parking garage just in case. We will continue to work to improve our parking situation to make it a more seamless experience for our guests. I do apologize for the lack of quality in our sleeper sofa mattress. We have purchased some foam mattress toppers to help alleviate any uncomfortable ones. We hope to improve upon these details for your next visit! I hope you have a fantastic rest of your week. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!   Sincerely,  Nicholas Houck Nick.houck@hilton.com (949)-425-9500

Summary: The friendly staff went above expectations to get to know us. They provided us with water & made our grandkids feel special with personal hellos. The parking is free and accessible. The rooms and premises are clean and stocked with kitchen utensils.  There's outside grills and games. We've stayed as a romanticromanti and as a family. Both times were excellent.

Best sleep i had in months. 10 dollar uber to Laguna beach and just up hill from anything you could need e.g. trader joes and convience stores. Staff was helpful pleasant and kind. Great for a staycation or working trip

The people working at the hotel made it all worth while- very friendly and helpful.  The food for breakfast and dinner were surprising good and healthy.  Only wish there was an iron in the room for may clothes.  The hotel washer and dryer worked well.

The suite was beautifully maintained. Linens were clean, floor was clean, bathroom, and mini-kitchen were very clean. It was a pleasure to stay there. We had to be on the road early, so we skipped the free breakfast, but I'm sure it was nice too. The staff was friendly, efficient, and professional. I truly appreciated that.
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie D,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your recent experience with us and our prospective guests. I cannot tell you how much your feedback means to our team. We hope you will be able to take advantage of our breakfast upon your return! I am so pleased to read that our team took excellent care of you during your visit. I hope our property and other Hilton’s continue to meet and exceed your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Nicholas Houck Front Office Manager Nick.houck@hilton.com (949)-425-9500

Summary: Since we were staying for a whole week we wanted more than just a bedroom.   This definitely met our needs and gave us the additional space we wanted without spending a lot of money. Everything was clean, bright, and looked new.  The staff at the front desk were wonderful.  Always friendly and helpful with everything we needed. Breakfast was good.  We only took advantage of the complimentary dinner and happy hour once but it was very nice.  Only wish we had more time to enjoy the outside pool area.
Manager Response: Dear Cheryl F,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experiences with us and our prospective guests. We are so pleased to hear that our suites and services met all of your needs and expectations. We hope you will join us again soon for our evening social and some pool time! We look forward to welcoming you back for your next visit.   Best wishes,  Nicholas Houck Nick.houck@hilton.com

Summary: Staff was wonderful, rooms were big , complimentary breakfast and evening social . pool area is beautiful. my kids love this hotel and we have been here multiple times we will definitely  be back next summer for a family vacation
Manager Response: Dear KMarina2011,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your recent experience and for choosing our property. We are thrilled to hear that your family enjoyed our hotel so much! We truly appreciate your continued visits and look forward to welcoming you all back for your next family vacation!  Best wishes,  Nicholas Houck Nick.houck@hilton.com

Summary: My room had long female hairs sticking on the wallpaper (on the wall). long hairs in the bath-tub and on the floor near the bathroom door. Breakfast choices were below expectation. Hairs on the carpet of the room.
Manager Response: Dear Pinakin G P,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with our property. I am truly sorry for the less than exemplary quality of your suite and accommodations. There is no excuse for the lapse in cleanliness that you found at our property. I assure you this is not indicative of the quality of service we provide here.  We truly appreciate you bringing this to our attention and will be reviewing this feedback with our housekeeping and breakfast to ensure this does not happen to you or any other guest. I would love to do anything we can to make this up to you. I have attached my email below for further communication if you wish. I hope you have a safe and enjoyable rest of your visit to Southern California. I hope you will consider our hotel once if your travels take you through this area. Thank you so much again for your visit and for choosing our property.  Sincerely,  Nicholas Houck nick.houck@hilton.com (949)-425-9500

Summary: A newer property located just inland from the coast with easy access to the Laguna and Newport beach areas.Customer service was exceptional from the great staff.Bed matresses were low quality and you could feel the springs in any position.Parking right outside can fill up and cause you to have to park several blocks away--so park early!Breakfast and evening socials are conducted out of a very small room with only one entrance/exit point so to say it was crowded and quite the cluster with many small kids and travelers with little to no appreciation for others or personal space is an understatement.Pool and jacuzzi are is quite nice and clean with great views of the surrounding areas.

I stay at this hotel regularly.  The staff are fantastic and very helpful. More than once, they have gone out of their way to help me.  The complimentary breakfast and social hour are great and convenient for me when I'm travelling on business.

We had a wonderful, relaxing stay at this Hotel.   The breakfast was wonderful, and we loved the evening social immensely during the week days!  Loved our room and the staff was fabulous! Highly recommend this hotel and we will be back!

We checked in late and we're given a small, dark ground floor room.  Other than that, the hotel was fine.  The location is good.  The hotel is clean and new.  Breakfast was about what you would expect from a free buffet.
Manager Response: Hi there NOLA70115,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with the TripAdvisor community and our team! We are so sorry to see that you all did not enjoy the accommodations on our ground floor room. We would love to have the opportunity to host you on a different floor during your next visit. I am pleased to see that you otherwise enjoyed your visit with us. We will do everything we can to make your next visit with us a memorable one. I hope you have a fantastic rest of your week.   Sincerely,  Nicholas Houck Front Office Manager Homewood Suites Aliso Viejo - Laguna Beach 949-523-6337

Summary: I chose this location for it's proximity to my business needs and the airport, however the hotel is very near a wide variety of restaurants and leisure activities. The evening snack/dinner service is helpful if you are pushing the limits of your daily per-Diem.

Stayed at this hotel for 2 long months! and they made the entire stay totally worth it!   Very friendly staff starting from the front desk team to the catering team to the housekeeping team...all of them are always smiling and making you feel at home. This quality makes the hotel better than the others especially when the stay duration is so long!  The rooms are nice and large with a small kitchenette and all utensils available. They have a sofa, a closet, microwave, a refrigerator and all other equipments one can think of. It's perfect for a long stay where you can cook your own food and live the way you want. Bed is nice and comfy and the bathrooms are good.  They also have evening socials where they serve complimentary snacks and wine/beer. Its a nice place to unwind after a

My family stayed 3 weeks in June/July. We had a perfect stay at this beautiful hotel with the sweetest and efficient staff in the safe and cute city of Aliso Viejo. Great spacious room, very clean, kitchen with everything you need. The breakfast and evening social is very good and with a great selection. Evening meal a complete tasty dinner. The pool is very nice and even in July mostly quiet and not too crowded. Loved the 24/7 coffee/tee possibility and the possibility of keeping food/drinks in large fridge/freezer, cooking own meals and the possibility of using the barbeque in the garden. The areas for breakfast, dinner and bar are beautiful both inside and outside. Staff worked hard and are really the nicest! Finally: great quiet neighbourhood and short drive to Laguna and

The staff members were friendly, helpful, and happy!! I had a very nice experience and I would stay there again.  My room was clean and pretty.  The only minor downside was that my room felt a little cold even when I turned up the temperature of AC to the highest it could go at 75 degrees (I get cold easily).  I had to turn off the AC while sleeping but then I got a little to hot.  Would have been perfect if I could have raised the temp to 77.

Summary Heading: Great base for South Orange county
Summary: We chose the Homewood Suites for its kitchen amenities as it has a cooktop and Microwave + full size fridge. My wife is Gluten and Dairy Free so at the moment restaurants can be a bit challenging but the amenities at this Hilton hotel made it an ideal place to stop. Aliso Viejo is a very well laid out City with plenty of things to do but with the added bonus of Laguna Beach just a short drive. The hotel was well appointed and very efficient. We liked the complimentary breakfast and evening social. It is also surprisingly quiet. Good value for the area particularly for Laguna Beach

This is my second time at this particular Homewood Suites by Hilton--the first time I was only here for one night. This trip I am here for 11 nights, which I have completed half of that stay.  The location is great for me as I here on business, and the office it just one block away. Front desk staff have been helpful. However, I do get a bit frustrated with the cleaning staff, as my room hasn't really been cleaned since I checked in 6 days ago. They just change out the towels and semi make up the bed. Kitchen floor was sticky, I feet was sticking to it yesterday.  They never return anything to its place, good example. I iron my clothes in the morning before going to work, usually rushing out I leave the ironing board up and hangers on the bed...when I come back they are still
Manager Response: Dear mwadew,  Thank you so much for taking the time time share your current experience from us. I know we only have a few days left of your stay with us. I would love to make this right and make it up to you. I would like to express my sincerest apologies for what has been a less than exemplary stay thus far. Your feedback is critical in helping our team recognize our areas for opportunity and make the necessary improvements. I hope we leave you with a better lasting impression for the remainder of your visit. I look forward to speaking with you soon.   Sincerely,    Nicholas Houck Nick.houck@hilton.com

Summary: We needed a place close by while our house was being painted and Homewood Suites was a perfect choice.  (A friend was also looking for a local place to stay during construction but found out that no pets were allowed.) In our King room, we had lots of space, along with the full kitchen.  There were lots of outlets, including in the base of the lamps for easy charging.  Wifi was excellent.  Downsides were that our room always felt cold to me with cool air always blowing.  The doors were very heavy, and it was congested in the closet/sink/bathroom area with the light over the sink only four feet from a sleeping person's head.  Something to consider for the remodel someday!  Breakfast choices were impressive and there were lots of comfortable seating choices in the lobby with its

Our annual trip to California was absolutely fabulous! Homewood Suites is a beautiful and clean hotel. The staff is absolutely fabulous. We were greeted with snacks and water and our suite was great. Breakfast served daily and reception/cocktail hour was a hit for the adults and kids. Cute outdoor area. We were able to sit and watch the kids play games, snack on fruit and wine, and enjoy the gorgeous California weather! Will definitely be our go to spot every year! If you are looking for a family friendly, clean, and fabulous hotel.. Homewood Suites Aliso Viejo is highly recommended.

We have stayed at this hotel many times. The staff is always friendly and professional. The accommodations are great; on site laundry, fitness center, complimentary breakfast and evening reception! Great price and location...only about 10 minutes from the beach!

We had a horrible experience with the hotel we stayed at the days BEFORE we got to the Homewood suites, so when we got there it was a breath of fresh air, they were so helpful and accommodating, our room was huge and very clean and modern, they cleaned every time we left, they gave great recommendations of the surrounding area, the pool is heated and super fun, the complementary breakfast had tons of options and was very good, complementary coffee was a huge plus for me, they really make you feel at home with the full kitchen stocked with glass ware, silverware, pots & pans, and overall we all loved our stay the Homewood suites. Thanks for turning our trip around and giving us a great time! We will be returning and recommending!
Manager Response: Hey there!  Thank you so much for sharing your most recent visit with us. We are so thrilled to have been able to turn your trip around. We understand there are so many opportunities for a hotel to hit or miss in their services and accommodation. We are pleased that we were able to deliver across the board during your stay. It sounds like you all got to enjoy all our property has to offer. We cannot thank you enough for your high praise and recommendation. We look forward to welcoming you back to our property soon!  Safe travels,  Nicholas Houck (949)-425-9500 Nick.houck@hilton.com

Summary: I stayed at the Homewood from 6/19 thru 6/24. I had read great reviews on this property and they were spot on!  Nick, the Front Desk Manager, greeted me when I got there. He was professional, friendly, and went above and beyond in accommodating my needs.  The entire team, from the front desk, housecleaning, bar and kitchen, were outstanding.  Olga, the bartender had such a great personality.  They have an amazing outdoor patio, with fire pits, two grills, tons of seating, etc.  My friends came to the hotel one night and my husband grilled chicken, tenderloin and veggie skewers.  We enjoyed great wine and dinner without having to go out to a restaurant.  They had everything we needed to grill and eat dinner.  And, having a bar sure didn't hurt.  The rooms have full kitchens and
Manager Response: Dear Linda V,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your recent experience with us. It was an absolute pleasure meeting you and your husband. I was so happy to see you all get to utilize our outdoor space and grill. We truly appreciate your kind words and recommendation. We cannot wait to welcome you and your husband back upon your return!   Sincerely,  Nicholas Houck (949)-425-9500 Nick.houck@hilton.com

Summary: Came for business in Irvine and wanted to get closer to the beach and away from the airport and found this little gem.  Great rooms, clean and friendly staff.  Only down fall is hopping on the toll roads to get to Irvine but that is the only issue for me.  I will be back for sure.
Manager Response: Dear rodjan5,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your recent experience with us. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your service and the accommodations you received during your stay! We are so lucky you found us at the right balance from the beach and the airport.The tolls are pesky and expensive but are quite convenient. We're only a few minutes further away if you take the 5 exit off of Alicia Pkwy. Thank you again for joining us. We look forward to welcoming you back for your next visit.   Safe travels,  Nicholas Houck (949)-425-9500 nick.houck@hilton.com

Summary: Love the hotel with all the amenities and well laid out room and Comfortable beds.  The location is surrounded by boutiques and residential condos.  Friendly staff that is able to help with any questions or issues.  Recommend if you are in the Laguna area.
Manager Response: Dear 326ejones,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your recent experiences from your most recent stay. We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your room, service and our accommodations. We really appreciate the high praise and recommendations! We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in the area.  Safe travels,  Nicholas Houck (949)-425-9500 nick.houck@hilton.com

Summary: Stayed here for two nights on business. Walked to get coffee a block down the street and walked to the office. I don’t know much about the area/location other than that. But the room itself was perfect for me. Full kitchen, including full sized refrigerator and dishwasher. Room has utensils and plates and all. The room was very comfy, style up-to-date, and great layout. Pleasantly surprised!

We were very happy with the location of this hotel.  Parking was very tight, but we found a spot. The front desk staff were very accommodating and friendly. If you have 4 guests, double check your hotel count before jumping in the shower.

Stayed in room 405. It was quiet and very clean !!! Staff is very friendly, so thank you all! Evening socials were great ! Beer and wine were included . Breakfast has a little of everything . Breads, bagels English muffins danishes , cereals , homemade waffles, fruit and yogurts, eggs, sausage, bacon and more ! Pool was very nice , however the chlorine was a little much for me . This is my second time staying here . I highly recommend this hotel !!

My family stayed here for a graduation weekend - it couldn't have been any nicer - new property is in a quiet city walk area - only 2 years young and its modern CA chic - rooms are spacious and very comfortable Everyone on hospitality team was welcoming and helpful the complimentary breakfast very nice - a lot of variety and warm items as well

Great location, wonderful staff, beautiful property. Enjoyed every minute of our stay. Loved the beautiful views, proximity to the beach. They really make you feel “at home.” Looking forward to the next visit.

I chose this location for its proximity to the beach. Went with my wife and kids for our Anniversary. The hotel is very close to Romano's Macaroni Grille, which was a plus. Felt like a home away from home.

We stayed at this hotel for a wedding and both evenings before and after the wedding we gathered together and staff let us have a great time. They have a great outside patio and I pull for the kids the stuff was amazing I would definitely recommend this place thank you for all that you have done to make our stay extra special

I was blown away with the customer service from EVERYONE.  The location and hotel is beautiful everywhere and clean.  The front desk accomodated my family of 5 in a bigger room to be more comfortable.  The breakfast was perfect.  We really enjoyed our stay here and it was relaxing.  It was a much needed get away and staying here made it perfect.

Summary Heading: Homewood Suites by Hilton Aliso Viejo, Very Good
Summary: Was a very nice hotel, I'm a Hilton Honors guys so I like Hilton run hotels, Homewood Suites did not disappoint, I like the spacious rooms, with full size refrigerator/frezzer, microwave, stovetop and dished & silverware.  The only thing was the breakfast, I know its complimentary but the scrambled eggs were in a word

Summary Heading: A very modern well equipped hotel
Summary: We stayed here durning our tour of north and south California for several nights.  Our room-condo has a kitchenette within which were very nicely designed with Comfortable beds and clean and nicely appointed shower and toilet area.  It is situated well away from the beach some 5/10 miles further than we had realised.  There is no restaurant other than breakfast which was all self service but very acceptable and the staff in there were very friendly.  The nearest places to eat at night was down the hill near the cinema which had lots of eating choices.

Summary Heading: Great Value in an Excellent Location
Summary: The hotel is very clean and very friendly. We chose it because we are Hilton Honors members, and because of the location, as we were in town for a family wedding on the beach, just 10-15 minutes drive away.

my stay was like i am in the comfort of my home, the hotel is quite rooms was clean linens were clean and the kitchen was very organized. i would highly recommend staying here. i will be choosing your hotel on my next trip.

Very roomy set up with a kitchen, living room and separated bedroom with 2 queen beds.  Perfect location for exploring OC.  Only downside? Cheap linens on the beds--the bed itself was comfortable but the linens felt like plastic.

Everything we needed for a short vacation: Good location. Clean, spacious suites with kitchen area. Comfortable bed. Good complimentary breakfast. Complimentary parking. Friendly and helpful staff. Front Office Manager Nicholas Houck was extremely helpful.

Homewood Suites Aliso Viejo is clean and has a staff that goes above and beyond to provide excellent service. Wonderful location near shopping, dining, and the beach. For the business traveler the ability to have staff grocery shop, on site laundry, and great breakfast and evening reception are wonderful!

This hotel smells like brand new materials, the cleanliness is the beyond for the price. Being only 15 minuite a from the beach, this is the best stay for any middle class family/individual. I felt safe at night coming back to the hotel late, free parking and excellent service.

Summary Heading: Extremely clean and new. Very spacious.
Summary: Extremely clean and new. Spacious with kitchen area.  Breakfast was great. Offered a lot of fruit. Had a new retro look through out the hotel. Fantastic pool area. Computer and printer room was very nice.

Homewood Suites was nice. Breakfast had a decent amount of options, including two DIY waffle makers, some hot options, cereal, breads, fruit, etc. They also have a daily happy hour sort of event that features alcoholic beverages and some appetizers. You could seriously make a dinner out of it, which makes this a bargain for a hotel. Staff was very friendly and always welcomed us back with a smile and wished us a good day as we left. Rooms were nice, and smelled new, and were  clean except for the mold growing in the shower. Also awkward was the weird shelf placed about 12” off the ground in the shower. I still can’t figure out what it’s for because it’s too low for leg shaving purposes. No other shelf except a soap sized dish exists to bring in your toiletries. (See photo.)  The

Summary Heading: Stayed here while visiting my daughter
Summary: I absolutely loved this hotel, if you are looking for a home away from home that is clean and comfortable than do not overlook this hotel!!  I could not have been more pleased by my 5 night stay, it was a perfect place to stay close to my daughters home.  Everyone from the front desk staff to the housekeeping staff and the food and beverage staff could not have been more friendly they really made you feel special.   I loved the fact that you had a full kitchen, we did not cook breakfast was served every morning and it was hot and had a nice mix of breakfast items hot and cold items that were tasty and the presentation was fabulous.  Every night Monday - Thursday features a complimentary wine/beer and  appetizer social from 5-7 they do a wonderful job again, superb presentation

Always love staying at Homewood. They are always clean and friendly. Its great being able to cook a meal while on the road. with kids it nice to not have to eat out all the time. Homewood is my preferred place to stay when traveling.

Everything is very close. Restaurant and movie theater is a few blocks away. Very convenient location in South Orange County. Hotel is very clean and the staff is very friendly. You really can’t go wrong here.

This hotel has a modern look and comfortable rooms where you can not only sleep, but hang out with friends or family before going out. The kitchen is a great amenity and they are often priced the same or lower than nearby hotels that don't have this. The immediate area is a weird mix of office park and apartments, but if you go out a few miles there are some great restaurants and things to do. Rooms are generally quiet and the beds are comfortable.

Nick was great at the desk .. nice spacious room .. loved the pool area ,lots of room to spend out. good size fitness room ... nice size laundry room and enjoyed the complimentary breakfast  ..very clean also

Recently we stayed at the Homewood Suites for an event at the SOKA university. Not only did we find the hotel very comfortable, but the location is ideal. It is close to many restaurants, the university and only about 15 minutes away from Laguna beach. The room was very spacious and clean, and the staff at the hotel were very friendly. As a bonus, the breakfast in the morning was plentiful and fresh. On our next trip, we will definite stay here again.

This is a business hotel with smaller suites.  We stayed in 2 queen 1 bedroom.  Microwave, refrigerator, stove, dishes and basic essentials.  When we arrived at the hotel room and grabbed a bath towel to freshen up it had filthy dirty stuff on it and it was folded neatly in the bathroom so the maids obviously don't check the towels that are already there.  I wouldn't say this was the cleanest Homewood Suites I've ever stayed in either. Sofa bed was awful, very this, no support at all.  We got crafty and put couch cushions under thin mattress which made it better. Queen beds were good.  Bedding was horrible.  I guess business travelers don't mind because it's just a night or two.  We were here 4 nights.   They have a bar which is only open a few hours, not to convenient when

Aliso business -  exceeded my expectations. Great room, breakfast and evening happy hour. Clean room, helpful staff and terrific food. Rooms are modern and accommodating for both business and relaxing.

Summary Heading: Perfect spot for an evening of entertainment at SOKA
Summary: We were going to attend a performance at SOKA Performing Arts Center and didn't want to drive home so we booked this hotel. It is beautifully appointed, spotlessly clean and quite comfortable. The only negative was the very small bathroom. The young man who checked us in was very welcoming, pleasant and efficient. This is always a plus and yet not always the case at many properties.

A very nice place, with great breakfasts and quiet. Nice bar in the evening and billiards. Clean room, kitchen with equipment, nice bathroom - clean and dry. A comfortable place in the center, you can drive or take a walk.

Stopped in for one night to meet up with family and really enjoyed the room space at Homewood Suites. The lobby was also spacious and comfortable. And the complementary Breakfast bar was also a nice surprise.

This is a great Suite Hotel in a quiet neighborhood  With plenty of Amenities .. Kitchen... Breakfast included and a 5 pm social hour.  This is a great area with plenty of restaurants  Nearby  Laguna Beach close too Easy freeway accessibility

Summary Heading: Great hotel, pristine, well located in modern neiborhood
Summary: This hotel is located in a well communicated and planned neighborhood, with modern apartments and high tech corporations were you can walk around the area and have all the services at walking distance (though terrain is slightly hilly). If you want to feel at home, check this hotel.

Excellent hotel and a great value for quality amenities! Very close to shopping and restaurants and easy access to freeway. We loved the outdoor jacuzzi, bbqs and firepit. The breakfast was exceptional and the rooms were well accommodated. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful. A real home away from home!

Summary Heading: Excellent location, safe and nice staff
Summary: Highly recommend in this area of Aliso Viejo/Laguna Beach.  Staff is very helpful. Close to nice retail area, Aliso Town Center which is walking distance and near cool park.  Good for business and family stays.  Hotel is quiet too!  Excellent evening social hour with good food.  Breakfast is also very good.

We stayed at this hotel for a week and from arrival to departure everything was top notch. Rooms were nice size and clean, breakfast and evening social was great and staff was friendly and helpful. This hotel is in great location close to groceries , restaurants and shopping. We would definitely choose Homewood again.

This will be my first choice of a suite when traveling.  It was excellent in every way including a wide menu for the complimentary breakfast and dinner.  Excellent knowledgeable and friendly staff.  Great gym, pool, jacuzzi and laundry facilities.

This hotel is AMAZING!!!!! I LUV the style, service and equipments.  There is parking space available in the plaza. The lobby is very spacious and stylish. There is also business center and some drinks available (coffee/water).  If you proceed further, you will see there is a pool table for people to play. At the side, you will see work bar tables. These tables are well deisgned, which have hooks for bags and plugs for computer/charger.  The outdoor is pretty cozy too. There is a palce where u can BBQ and also chill with your friends around fireplace. This hotel also provide breakfast.  My friend and I checked in pretty fast.  Once u go to the room, its pretty welcoming. They work table is movable. They also have a big Tv that is adjustable, which u can face the living room or

Everything was great except my check-in experience. Best breakfast ever! I was hoping I would be able to take full advantage of the location and the ammenities, however due to the cold I was not able to see just how heated the pool was. Never the less, the room was fantastic. All of the equimpment worked, the bathroom was exceptionally clean, bed was super comfy and they have the very best breakfast spread I have ever had, period.  Great value, great trip.

This a a very well maintained, relatively new property in the centre of a great neighbour. The town centre is only at 15 minutes walk with great food, shopping and entertainment options.  The suites are clean and very functional with full kitchenette and a working desk.

It was a fun trip the kitchen didn’t have the proper utensils to cook with so I would bring your own knives and cooking supplies . Doesn’t have a bellman or anyone to help with luggage so be prepared and pack smart

I love staying at this property and never had problems-until this last trip. There was absolutely no parking available both nights I stayed. Very huge inconvenience for a lot of guests-including myself.

Summary Heading: Great hotel in very quiet neighborhood
Summary: The hotel is in a very quiet neighborhood, no noisy street or airport around, but still close to plenty of dining and shopping possibilities. All is brand new and very well maintained. Rooms are large and with small kitchenette. Only minus was the housekeeping which was not top notch. But we would stay again for sure.

Stayed at this location for a week while visiting family.  Rooms were clean and large.  The staff was very friendly and accomodating.  The breakfast was really good for someone without gluten/dairy allergies.  There was always fresh fruit for the allergy sensitive guest.

Wonderful experience!  Great location and facilities.  Love having a bit more room.  The front desk service was outstanding. Would have liked a bit more variety on main breakfast items.  If you have Denver omlets, also have a plain option too.

This hotel is in a very nice area and is much more than expected.  Breakfast was crowded but can’t be helped by the number of guests.  The rooms were very nice and the service was above and beyond.   Very nice place to stay!

booked it bcz of location but was very happy. very specious, good amenities, comfortable and basically exactly what we needed for a family. would definitely stay at Home suite again and would look for one in other locations for traveling. love the concept.

Love this hotel and the staff is always the best. They really do care about your comforts away from home. It is a perfect place to have a meeting and close to everything . The hotel is very clean and will continue coming back

You get a lot for your money in this nicely decorated comfortable room.  Kitchen, comfortable bed, full breakfast buffet.  It is a very charming location.  Included sofa, internet and many features of which I did not take advantage.  Wish I had had time!

Summary Heading: Not aware of Scheduled Power Outage when making a reservation 24 before
Summary: I made a reservation 24 hours before my stay and was not informed of a scheduled power outage from 10PM to 5AM.  This is not acceptable service for a hotel charging more than $200/night.  Poor customer service from Management.
Manager Response: Ms. Grater,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry that the planned power outage negatively impacted your stay at our hotel. If you plan on staying with us in the future, we do recommend that you check our website for alerts regarding any upcoming maintenance or similar events at our property. However, as we are always looking to improve guest experience, we will certainly take your comments regarding communication of these events into consideration. We apologize once again for any inconvenience.

Summary: Conveniently located near restaurants, movie theater, and toll road. Suite is roomy and very comfortable. Breakfast was very good with several choices including waffles, eggs, fruit, bagels, juices, and very good coffee.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and our yummy breakfast! We can't wait to welcome you back!

Summary: Clean and well maintained rooms, staffs are helpful and has connectivity to major travel spots. Best part is rooms have mini kitchens. Really enjoyed my 35 days stay and would definitely recommend this place to all
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback! We're so happy to hear you enjoyed your extended stay with us and felt at home! Please keep us in mind if ever in the area or in need of a vacation!

Summary: I found Home Suites a delightful place to stay. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The Bed was great!!! I enjoyed the breakfast. I am on a low carb diet thus needed protein, and veg/fruits that I could eat. Nicely they had it all, so everyone could be happy. Easily answered questions that I had and greeted me friendly each time they saw me. It was very nice.

This was our first experience with Homewood Suites. This Aliso Viejo hotel was first rate. The kitchen was well appointed, the living room area was very comfortable, the space was roomy for our week's stay. This felt like our home away from home with the friendly and welcoming staff, top quality amenities like breakfast, manager's cocktail reception with even salads, a beautiful courtyard to socialize, pool table and pool for the family, and an excellent fitness area. Nice area to take walks...even to shops. I highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and truly felt at home! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Could not ask for any better.  This hotel was in excellent shape and. Beds were very comfortable and rooms are very quiet.  The staff was extremely friendly and accommodating.  Will definitely stay here again.

Room was very, very comfortable and modern - difficult to fault. Flipside is that breakfast was dreadful (note to hotel: offering just 3 cereals all of which had very high sugar content - frosted flakes, cheerios, fruit loops - is not good)

Summary Heading: Excllent hotel that makes you feel at home
Summary: Will write more later, but my wife and I did a 5 night stay here. From check-in to check out, we loved this place. The morning breakfasts were excellent, with both hot and cold items, that were replenished often. Weekdays breakfast was from 6:00 - 9:00 a.m. (wish it stayed open till 9:30 a.m.), while weekends from 7:00 - 10:00.  Evening social had great food options with very fresh ingredients. Always a salad option, with soup, plus some hot items. Could definitely make a meal of it here.

Summary: My daughter and I stayed over a weekend for a funeral and were pleased with the size and layout of the room. It was very spacious, clean, and with modern decor and colors. The little kitchenette was perfect as was the sofa and large screen tv (most hotels have smaller tvs). On the downside, it was very crowded...no parking in the attached lot, breakfast area overrun with families and children running around, lobby crowded with people waiting to check in and out. I also requested a late check-out as I'm a Hilton Gold member and the latest they would allow was 12noon.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed your overall stay. Yes, it is true that the season brings higher volume of guests to our property which our staff prepares for all year. Our late check-outs are based on availability and with high occupancy, it does limit our late check-out time frames. I am pleased to hear we were able to accommodate you a later check-out time than our scheduled 11am check out.  We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: My daughter and I recently stayed at the Homewood Suites in Aliso Viejo on a trip from L.A. to San Diego. The property is located in a nice little business district and it is very quiet. The hotel itself is new and beautiful. The rooms are spacious and comfortable and the staff was very friendly.   When we arrived, although we didn't take advantage of it, there was an evening reception featuring complimentary beer and wine, as well as pasta and salad. The breakfast offering was pretty extensive - eggs, sausage, belgian waffles, breads, cereals, fruit and yogurt. The scrambled eggs were some of the tastiest I've had at a hotel.   The hotel is located close to many shops and restaurants and is just off Highway 73 for easy access around Orange County. Laguna Beach is about a 15-20
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! We're glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and our location! We can't wait to welcome you back!

Summary: Great place for the family.  Breakfast, Suites, BBQ, Grass area, walking distance to movies and shopping.  Easy access to freeways and get to the beach fast.  We couldn't hear the neighbors so, sound isolation was good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to your return!

Summary: Excellent location. New hotel. Great noise abatement and helpful staff. Close to the Orange County Airport. Easy jaunt to nearby beaches. Parking was a bit limited and complimentary breakfast was crowded at times.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your overall stay. We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: I recommend this hotel to everyone!
Summary: We travelled with our children and this hotel was great place for our family. Friendly staff, Clean rooms, good breakfast, and great service. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone who is looking for a good place to stay.

Summary Heading: Great stay for business or pleasure
Summary: Multiple stays at this hotel for business have all been excellent. Clean, fresh, polite and efficient staff. Add an incredible breakfast and delightful evening social and you have a perfect stay! Close to my business and close to many fun locations. Family friendly as well. Highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! I'm glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! We'll see you next time!

Summary: I am really glad I picked this hotel for my special day. It felt like I home. I wanted to stay forever. The pool was a bit small but I love to swim and I loved it. My friends had fun and that means the world to me.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback! It is our goal for all our guests to enjoy their stay the way you and your friends did.   We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: A average mid-level "suites" hotel.  The main issue I had was parking, they do not have enough spaces... every night a minimum of 4 cars parked in the red zone and stayed that way all night.  Huge fire safety issue as they are in the red zone.  I saw that employees park onsite and not at the overflow lot a city block away.  Other issue was maid never cleaned one of the days, front desk was notified.  If I would have been paying the $269-290 a night, I would have been greatly disappointed.  This is a $150 a night hotel and not $250+ without taxes.

Homewood Suites in Aliso Viejo is a family oriented hotel offering the finest in service and quality. Service oriented staff at to take care of your every need from front desk, to the management, all are dedicated to making your stay the best possible.

The hotel was very relaxing, short drive from the beach, great value, and the employees were very courteous and helpful. There were plenty of restaurants and stores in the immediate area. We would stay again if in the area as it is convenient to the beach without the beach room prices.

Summary Heading: Extremely Disappointing for Close to $300 a night
Summary: What can I say? It's a mediocre chain hotel that would have been okay at $150 a night tops, but spending close to $300 a night with tax for motel style accommodations in the far suburbs of Orange County made me grumpy. I mean depending on season, I could have gotten a nice room in Manhattan for that same price.  The nicest thing about the hotel were the two very nice ladies who checked me in. Since I was coming down with a cold, it was also nice that they have a little convenience store by the front desk where you can pick up Advil and decongestants.  Rooms are typical cheap suburban motel. Lots of kids running around the lobby and at the free breakfast if that is not your thing.  Free breakfast mediocre. Pre-made omelets sitting in a warming tray. Would rather pay for breakfast

Stayed Saturday and Sunday evening while visiting family in Aliso Viejo. Accommodations exactly as advertised, clean and relatively new. Staff was friendly and helpful at check-in, breakfast and check-out. Didn't use pool or other facilities.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I'm glad to hear you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We had a 2 queen studio (which had a pullout sofa) and it was perfect!  Our two boys, ages 11 and 4, kick and move around a lot when they sleep so it was really nice for each of them to have their own bed- the 4-year-old was on the pullout sofa.  The hotel was really modern and new.  The shower had great pressure, the beds were comfortable, the room was clean, and it was really convenient to have a full-size fridge and a kitchen.  We loved our stay!

The property and the staff were exceptional.  My son and I enjoyed our stay.  The room was large and made visiting with friends very comfortable.  Having a kitchen was handy, but best of all were the breakfast and evening social offerings.  Wonderful stay. We enjoyed the pool table and the gas grills.

This was a one night stay in order to attend our grandson's graduation ceremony at U.C. Irvine and also to be close to his residence which was next to the hotel.  The hotel is located in a quiet location and has ample outdoor parking available.    The complimentary breakfast is better than average with sausage, scrambled eggs, belgian waffles, fruit, etc.  Seating arrangements for more than two people are limited.  My primary complaint is with hotels that insist on placing the bathroom vanity outside the bathroom and not providing some method of not disturbing the other guest in the middle of the night when using it.

Summary Heading: One rotten apple ruined my family vacation
Summary: Well let me begin by saying I am a Hilton honours member I always stay in Hilton Chains because they guarantee satisfaction or else they refund you your money. Well not this time!  Let me start off by telling you about the good things about this hotel: Hotel is stunning, located in Laguna beach about 15 minutes away from the beach area. The rooms and site is gorgeous. The cleanliness is unbelievable you can literally eat off the floor in the rooms and at the breakfast area. The breakfast is filled with fresh fruit such as strawberries, blue berries pine apples etc..!! delicious nutrious fruits! Most of the staff are unbelievably amazing and would bend over backwards to serve you and make you happy. From Carlos, to Hector, to Sally all four star employees who should be commended

The size of the room, the quality of the mattress, the convenience of the kitchen and especially the quiet are the things I appreciate about Homewood Suites, Aliso Viejo.  I highly recommend this hotel if you value privacy and comfort.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time and providing us your feedback. I'm happy to hear you felt at home during your stay. We look forward to your return!

Summary: I've been waiting for a new hotel to arrive in Aliso Viejo for several years now. This property has everything on my wish list: convenient location; rooms that are consistently quiet, comfortable, clean and full of light. The service is excellent, and the dining area and selections for breakfast and light dinner are excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us your feedback! I'm happy to hear you have enjoyed our property to it's full extent. We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Next weekend (June 16th) has rooms!  My Family had to cancel  room block due to illness....
Summary: We had 11 rooms for the whole weekend. Wanted so badly to stay here.  Family scheduled huge family birthday for 90 year old father in Mission Viejo. Members and friends arriving from all over California and out of state. Dad got sick and after brief hospital stay is much better but unable to attend the event. Marie  and Martha were fantastic during the planning and cancellation process.   Now they are yours.  ENJOY!!!!

Summary Heading: I've received better service at a Motel 6
Summary: The staff at this location is very unprofessional. There is no parking you have to park in your car will be towed spots that are not labeled Hilton.Then you have to walk back to the hotel. The only good thing about this hotel is the freshness of the breakfast and the pool. The bed mattress fels like a bubble mattress I could literally feel the springs.What is going on Hilton?

This is a Very Nice Hotel located a short distance from the Beach. We were pleased with the terrific customer service each employee displayed during our stay. Parking and Breakfast was included with our purchase. We will definitely stay at this Hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you in the near future!

Summary: Great location and extremely clean.  Both the breakfast and the evening hospitality were very nice.  I loved the design of the rooms.  The shower and bathroom are separate from the bathroom sink, which prevented the mirrors from "steaming up" when someone took a shower.

Very clean and new.  Staff was very helpful. I would definitely recommend this Hotel. Close to everything and not far from OC airport.  I did not have time for the complimentary bar but would have if time permitted.

Great visit, great atmosphere. What more to ask? We hadn't been on a couple's trip in way too long, and this did not disappoint. Easy access to lots of fun communities, Nixon Museum/Library and more. Or just sit around the pool and enjoy yourselves, as we did most of the time. Trader Joe's and Ralph's almost within walking distance. With complimentary breakfast and happy hour, easy to get plenty of food at your fingertips. We had lots of free veggies at social hour, then grilled at the poolside for our main meal. Fun, fun!

Great place. Great value. Will stay again. The staff are nice, and it's great for families and for a couple's getaway. Also great neighborhood, with relaxing vibes, near nice restaurants, etc. and not too far from beach.

Summary Heading: Best Hotel in Orange County by far
Summary: This hotel is gorgeous and peaceful yet has everything you need so close by...within walking distance are grocery stores, restaurants, movies, bars etc.  The staff is amazing and so professional.  I loved my stay here.  I wish I could have stayed longer.

I had a business trip to Aliso and stayed at the Hilton Homewood suites.  I believe the hotel was built in the last five years.  It felt like a new hotel.  The hotel looks like other Hiltons, with a breakfast / bar past the lobby.  There is a small convenience area to buy snacks etc.  Overall, it was a quiet, clean hotel.

I stayed at Homewood Suites Aliso Viejo for 8 days. It was located right down the street from my office. There was a mix up with payment by my company, but the front desk was very kind and everything was settled in the morning. The rooms were big nice and clean. The breakfast and social hour in the evenings were also very nice. I will stay again on my next trip to Aliso Viejo

Summary Heading: Awesome stay at the Homewood Suites!
Summary: I can't say enough about how much we enjoyed staying at this hotel. It was lovely, new, clean, with comfortable beds and pillows. The rooms were spacious with great kitchenettes. The staff was very welcoming, friendly and helpful. The complimentary breakfast was very good. The pool and hot tub were also very nice. We would definitely stay there again!

Didn't expect this hidden gem.  Beautiful room, clean, modern and had a full kitchen!  Loved staying there - super clean, nice staff and wonderful amenities.  Breakfast look amazing as well - wish we had more time to enjoy the hotel!  Thanks to the friendly staff it was a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time and providing us your feedback. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your time here with us!   We look forward to your return!

Summary: I had two rooms reserved here and had to cancel. Cancelled within the allowable timeframe and have a confirmation.  My credit card got hit for almost $600. After researching with Hilton's Diamond desk, it wasn't on my Diamond reservation page, so looked to be an accidental bill.   You'd think, with as long as I've been a top level/loyal Hilton user, I'd get some help What I got was no help, no call back, no results.  Guess I'll call American Express and cancel the charge.....See if that get's a response from them.  Stay here at your own risk!!

This is a good place to stay for families at a reasonable price for the area.  The rooms are spacious with a kitchenette and large refrigerator, sofa sleeper and complimentary buffet breakfast.  We did have to ask for extra towels, toilet tissue, shampoo, etc. as they were not all replenished when room was cleaned.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time and providing us your feedback. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. I will share your comments with the appropriate team members as we strive to improve our service very day!  We look forward to your return!

Summary: Very clean, updated and accessible hotel.  Staff was very friendly and rooms were extremely spacious.  Great for business or leisure travel.  The only issue was the internet.  I opted for premium internet and the connection kept going in and out.  Be careful because you will eat up your data if you are unaware.  I didn't report it to the staff because I was in and out so quickly.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback! We're glad you enjoyed your stay. We will most definitely be checking up on the internet connection problem you encountered.  We look forward to your return!

Summary: Ideally situated to everything and everywhere you may want to visit.  The hotel itself is beautifully designed and maintained.  A wonderful breakfast each and every morning and an evening social complete with snacks and the wine of your choice!  Each room and/or suite we stayed in is decorated in really good taste and with beautiful furnishings.  We highly recommend this Homewood Suites to friends and family who are planning a trip to southern California.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback of your most recent stay! I'm happy to hear you enjoyed our facility and your stay. We look forward to your return!

Summary: We stayed her for 3 weeks.  Family of 5.  I have no complaints.   The breakfast is  delicious  the evening  social hour is also wonderful.  The hotel is clean and in a great location.    I would definitely recommend

Wonderful place to stay, great location, child friendly, outstanding breakfast.  The staff at the hotel, were very friendly and professional, they processed my reservation in about 3 minutes. I will stay there again when in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us your feedback of your most recent stay. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to seeing you!

Summary: This hotel was conveniently located to my business meeting location but it was very nice to also discover that it was clean, comfortable with additional amenities like complimentary Wi-Fi and breakfast as well as a fully equipped kitchen...which helped keep travel expenses lower.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to your return!

Summary: We stopped over at this property for a couple days at the end of our southern California trip. Hotel is new and nice. Breakfast is great. Pool area is great and rooms are nice. The beds were awful, thin, spring mattresses. My wife and I tossed and turned and woke up with sore backs and necks all three mornings.  Additionally, we booked through Expedia and then mid-trip decided it made sense to try to leave a day early to break up our drive home.
