Although we could have been out by check out time on the second day, and Expedia was willing, the hotel said no and that we should have booked direct. I won't entirely rule this property out in the future but I will certainly check out some other hotels before booking here again.

Great location, rate and amenities! Staff was professional, helpful and welcoming. Kitchenette had a full refrigerator and kitchen was full stocked with dishes, utensils and pots and pans. Rooms size was perfect. Very clean hotel! Loved the complimentary breakfast! Enjoyed our stay so much we switched the next 4 stays for tournaments in Southern California  to Homewood suites!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time and providing us your feedback. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to your return!

Summary: Great place to stay after you go to Disneyland if you want to wake up closer to the beach! We also really liked the free parking and complementary breakfast and the bright atmosphere in the lobby a great experience for families not to mention the swimming pool which we didn't have time for.

The staff was extremely nice and the hotel is very clean and new. The queen suite room was awesome and perfect for extended stay. I liked this hotel better than the renaissance across the street. Great experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your staff. We look forward to your return.

Summary: Beautiful clean, new hotel in Laguna Beach area. Staff are courteous and very helpful. Great complimentary breakfast daily.  Hotel is located in a fairly quiet area surrounded by small upscale shops and within close proximity to a larger shopping area (there, you'll find Trader Joe's, Lowe's, Panera Bread and a Walgreen's, among other stores).   Will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Over charge/ and charge wrong card
Summary: They charge the wrong card the lady told me they wouldn't charge the other card didn't have money in my account they over draft my account they had 3 authorize on my card I ask for manager and they told there wasn't one check in and went back down there was a manager that was helpful there and try to fix the problem it wasn't fix had to wait 2 weeks after for it to appear and recharge the right card didn't say in there fine print didn't they have a hold on your funds 3 time when you paid with member points

The hotel staff isn't very personable, but they do a good job getting you checked in or answering your questions.  They seem like they are told to suppress their personalities with guests. But again, they are kind and helpful.  Hotel rooms are clean and it is nice to have a full fridge and stove.  Microwave, pots, tupperware, cups, mugs, silverware, cutting board ect are in the room for a full apartment like feel. Has a hot tub, pool and gym.  Full laundry on site and bar.  Does not offer room service or food for purchase.  Free breakfast and happy hour offered as well.

Room This property exceeded my expectations for a mid-high tier in North America. The rooms are bright and airy with large windows. We had a studio room. The bathroom is nicer than most other hotels of this level. The room we had did not have a tub, only shower, which I prefer much more.   Parking / facilities  There's a nice looking outdoor pool but given that we went in January, didn't get to use it. The gym was alright. The hotel has a cocktail hour with lots of snacks and wine in lobby in the afternoon Parking at night sometimes gets full but there's an overflow lot apparently - just ask the desk.   Location Easy to find. There's a whole shopping / food complex at the bottom of the hill that you can drive to (you can walk down but coming back may be a bit of a hike)

Everything was great.  Exactly what I would expect from a Hilton property.  Super clean and very friendly environment.  I would have liked to hear more about their programs etc.  Then again I was most likely in a hurry!

Nearly new hotel with high quality materials and furnishings, excellent complimentary breakfast, free parking, and quiet location. Easy access to freeways and surrounding areas, including Laguna Beach.

Flew in for wedding.  Great property however the last night was horrible due to noisy room above.  Had to call 3 times and threatened to resolve myself after running, pounding, and jumping on the floor above

Excellent hotel. The food service staff was so friendly and accommodating. The room was very comfortable. The pillows were the best ever! Location fantastic. Quiet, with good restaurants and shops nearby and just a short drive to Laguna Beach.

We prefer this property to Renaissance hands down. Every room is a suite and there is no parking or resort fee. I entertain family here frequently and truly enjoy the at ease feeling this property provides to my guests.

Summary Heading: Amazing place to stay in Aliso Viejo
Summary: Great value and incredibly quiet and clean. Will definitely be back. Delicious complimentary evening social and outstanding full breakfast (not just coffee and sweet rolls). The furnishings and the bed in particular, we very comfortable.

Summary Heading: Good place to stay for a business traveler that will be in town for a week or so
Summary: I travel often to the Irvine, CA for business.  Often I'm staying more than a couple of days.  In those cases I prefer Homewood Suites as you get a full kitchen and living area.  The Aliso Viejo location is a good one for me.  It has easy access to toll roads 73 and 133 which have less traffic and can get me going where I need to without all the traffic on 405 and 5.  I also tend to eat in and there is grocery shopping and other stores nearby.  The hotel also has a good breakfast and on Tue-Thu has good light evening food.  The room is a good size.  It has a good work area.  The sofa isn't the greatest, but it will do.  The bed is comfortable.  The rooms have ceiling fans which are nice, but are difficult to operate.  The fan will turn off in the middle of the night or the light

The hotel is close to the town center making it easy to access all your vacation needs. Additionally, the hotel is convienently located and the staff was excellent. The evening socials and morning breakfast made our stay very comfortable.

Great staff, great amenities. I could not have asked for a better stay. The breakfast and evening socials make the cost of this hotel a fantastic value and elevated the whole experience. Further the staff was so helpful and very cognizant of the guests experience at the hotel.

Summary Heading: Recently built hotel. Suites equipped with kitchens.
Summary: Hotel is part of a recently built residential / business park which is easily accessed from the freeway. Check-in for our three night stay was fine.  Our room was clean and spacious. There was a kitchen area with microwave/ oven, two hobs, large fridge, freezer and dishwasher. On the ground floor was a guest laundry making hotel perfect for a longer stay. Room was serviced daily.  Monday through Thursday from 5pm to 7pm there is a managers reception where a light meal (plenty for a main meal by UK standards) soft drink and wine is served. For those preferring to self cater there are supermarkets including Trader Joe's a short drive away.  No problem with free parking and WiFi worked well.  The hotel is only a short drive from the coast, we particularly enjoyed Dana Point.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to your future visit!

Summary Heading: A clean modern hotel with full-service kitchens, in Orange County
Summary: I was attracted to this hotel because it has a full-sized refrigerator.  It is about a 15-20 minute walk from a full-service shopping center with a huge supermarket and various restaurants.  The rooms were spacious, and quite quiet.  The staff was extremely friendly and courteous.  Everything seemed brand new.  The men's room in the lobby even had CNN TV coming out of the mirror!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with a family
Summary: Stayed for a week on spring break with my wife and 3 children.  Facilities were new and the complimentary breakfast and social hour were great.  Hotel was in a nice quiet location and with many activities about a 20 minute drive away (beach, hiking, shopping, Disneyland and the John Wayne airport).  Also only about an hour away from Carlsbad/San Diego.

My husband and  decided to take a trip back to the OC to visit some of the places we went to when we lived there 9 years ago.  We picked this hotel because of the location - it had been built since we mover away.  We were very pleased with the comfort, cleanliness, and the Happy Hour the hotel offered and the fact that the area was walk able.  We were able to walk to several restaurants.
Manager Response: thank you for taking the time and providing us your feedback. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The location and the hotel was great. The rooms were very clean and the beds were comfortable. The lobby had a small bar are where you could socialize and the bartender was very nice.  We will stay there again.

Had a pre-paid reservation through Expedia. Got walked. No problem if it's handled properly but you can guess by my rating that it wasn't. "Don't worry. We'll take care of everything". But here's the thing: they had no intention of taking care of everything. They knew 6 hours earlier that that they were going to walk us (that's when Expedia began trying to call me. Why Expedia and not the GM of the hotel? It's the hotel's responsibility to manage their inventory) and they were completely unprepared when we arrived, leading to a 45 minute ordeal at the front desk. And, even worse, they said I had to deal with Expedia if I thought I shouldn't be paying for the room in the hotel we got walked to! The poor employees who had to mop up this mess. They were wholly failed by their

Overall satisfied with the stay. The only think I will point out to is that there is no dry cleaning service and no complementary water bottles (even if you are Gold HHonor member). Besides that, I was pretty happy with my stay there.

I checked in for a one night stay to find no parking available. The front desk agent told several guests to just park in the red in front of the hotel. I was fine with that. The room was spacious and clean. I requested a wake up call for 6:30 am, which never happened and also requested fresh towels, which never showed up. Needless to say, I won't be staying here again. I'm in OC for business quite often and I wish I had the confidence to give them another try but, there are too many other well appointed hotels that have the competence to deliver on basic guest requests. I'll try the Renaissance next week...

very comfortable--very easy access to Laguna Beach--free parking and free breakfast add to the quality of affordability; secure  and close by mall and eating establishments-easy to get around as directions are generously given by he staff; Carlos is a gem --professional helpful caring

My husband and I stayed here for an extended weekend.  It was a great place to stay.  Extremely comfortable and very clean.  Excellent location.  Great for families and couples.  Wonderful amenities for the price.  Minutes from the beach...beautiful scenic areas to behold.  Extremely nice staff and very helpful and informative.   Hotel offers free breakfast, free parking, free wi-fi, guest laundry, small dinner options Monday - Thursday, and even though we were there as a couple, we saw many families but were never disturbed.  It was a peaceful and relaxing stay.  I am excited to plan a return trip to this establishment.  Thank you for an amazing incredible experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback. We're so excited to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and were able to take advantage of our amenities! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Great hotel, great location, and staff were always helpful and smiling. The complementary breakfast was great and varied each day slightly.  I didn't get a chance to attend the evening social but plan to do so on my next visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback. We're so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to your future stay with us!

Summary: Perfect location for purpose of trip plus close to the beach!!!  The rooms as well as the whole hotel were very clean!!! Beds were super comfortable and the room was extremely spacious.  The convenience of the kitchenette was helpful too.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Thoroughly enjoyed my stay.  The facility is gorgeous the staff deserves  a rating of '15' on a scale of 1-10!  The complimentary breakfast and dinner social are amazing, what I would expect to pay (a lot) for in a restaurant!  I have more trips
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: This was a great hotel. The room was clean, roomy and comfortable. We drove over 7 hours to get there and was disappointed that they would not allow us to check in, a bit to strick on this policy, however the front desk attendant was kind and gave my kids free ice cream for having to wait so long. I thought the hotel and surrounding area was more than adequate and would definitely stay there again- just not early.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us our feedback. I'm sorry we were unable to accommodate your early check in but I'm happy to hear our staff were able to take care of you while you waited! We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Booked this hotel due to location and breakfast included.  2 bed Studio Suite provided enough space for my family of 5!  Newer hotel (just over 1 year) with very polite and friendly staff.  Weekday happy hour was a nice bonus!  (beverages and various snacks, possibly enough for a light meal)  Pool is smallish, but the whole patio area is nice for sitting outside.  Outdoor gas firepit is nice for gathering around in the evenings.  Theater, dining, shopping all very close.  Will definitely stay here again, given the opportunity arises.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback from your recent stay! We're glad to hear you enjoyed your trip. We look forward to your future stay with us!

Summary Heading: Great hotel, brilliant service, spacious, well equipped rooms
Summary: We stayed at Homewood Suites recently while visiting relatives in Aliso Viejo.  We booked the hotel because it was the most conveniently situated for visiting our son and family. We were pleasantly surprised by how comfortable and well equipped the hotel was. So much thought has been put into the planning of the facilities in the hotel rooms. We did not cook while there but full facilities were present including fridge and cooker and dishwasher and cooking equipment. But at the same time as being practical, the room was relaxing, spacious and comfortable with a good sized bed. It was kept very clean and tidy. The room was surprisingly luxurious as well as having all the necessary utilities that might be required.  We will definitely visit again. The room came with free

Upon arrival we were checked in with great attention to our preferences by Sally & Matt. Both Front Desk agents were friendly and efficient.  Our rooms were spacious and well appointed.  Social hour and breakfast were perfect. Hope to stay here again.

Summary Heading: Room not ready till one half hour later.
Summary: Very nice facility. We will be using your hotel soon as our house in Newport Coast is under construction.  Hopefully we will not have to wait late for our room. Thanks.  Your reception person was very nice when we made the reservation a week before.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to your upcoming visit!

Summary: We were staying here to visit family nearby. The hotel exceeded our expectations. It was in a pleasant area, and was central to many of the places we visited during the five days. The room was large and very well presented. There was plenty of parking. Excellent breakfast. Friendly staff, particularly the breakfast ladies. I'd look forward to staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback. We're glad you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Expect to get triple billed if you stay here
Summary: Expect to get triple billed if you stay here. I called the management to resolve the matter 5 days after my check in and they were in denial and did not help. Having to resolve the matter with my CC Company now. Pity Hiltons have turned into this misuse of folks credit.

Stayed here for business meetings in the area. Great value as the hotel offers breakfast and lite meal offerings with drinks in the late afternoon.  Rooms are suites, with kitchen and microwave and are very spacious. Great if you are staying over an extended number of days. Staff are very friendly and helpful.   Location is good as well with a number of good restaurants and grocery store just a short walk down the hill.

Summary Heading: I was triple billed by reservations
Summary: I was triple billed by reservations and no call back to resolve the situation. Left messages and called the front desk. Will have to work with my Credit Card Co to get the money back. Not a good experience.

Very good accommodations for a great rate. The rooms are spacious and clean, and there are shops close by though I didn't have time to check them out. This hotel was chosen by my colleague, but I would definitely stay here again. The front desk clerk Carlos went out of his way to make sure I was taken care of on more than one occasion. I took a 15 minute Uber down to Laguna Beach one morning which made this business trip even more memorable.

Last year in September I was suppose to go on a trip with my boyfriend and a group of friends for 4 days to California. Well he broke up with me and they stopped talking to me the closer the trip got. I had already paid for my plane ticket and activities that I was going to do once I got there so I decided to still go. I ended up booking this hotel because it seemed to be between San Francisco and Hollywood (which where the  activities had been paid for). It was the best choice I made all of 2016!!  After flying on the same plane as my ex and our "friends" for 2 hours I was ready to just lie down. I got there 2 hours before check in and the front desk lady did her best to try and get me into a room asap. I was in a room within 30 minutes! She made my day. The breakfast is
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review! So glad you enjoyed your stay and felt at home! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Really enjoyed my stay at the Hilton. Clean room, nice staff, would recommend to anyone wanting a hassle free internet experience. :) The rooms we're very nice and open, great water pressure and clean beds.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review! WE appreciate all feedback. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I do think that the staff is very polite. I have had really good experiences at this hotel.  The accommodations are very nice. When I'm traveling for business I'm always welcomed and greet it politely. The breakfast they started season and the 6 o'clock Cocktail hour is very nice. In the area it is one of the nicer hotels reasonably front
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review on TripAdvisor. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: We had a peaceful, quiet sleep both nights. Breakfast was excellent both mornings and the servers were very polite. The hotel is located very close to everything you would need in the area and it was about a 15 minute drive to Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out the survey and give us feedback.

Summary: I had an excellent stay at Homewood Suites!  Room was spacious and clean.  Front desk, housekeeping & hostesses at the complimentary breakfast were all very friendly.  I definitely will stay here again when in the area!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review, we appreciate the kind words.

Summary Heading: Great find in Laguna Hills, California
Summary: Very comfortable and a complete kitchen a desk area make it perfect for the business traveler. Also a total value when you include breakfast and heavy appetizers/drinks in the evening. Suites are spacious with a walk in shower and dressing area. Plenty of closet space and had a very nice swimming pool.

Summary Heading: Excellent Place for a visit to Orange County
Summary: The hotel was amazing, and the additional amentities supplied outweigh most other hotels in the area. The staff was awesome and did everything they could to make mine and my coworkers stay very enjoyable. I would recommend this to anyone travelling to the Orange County area.

One of the places to stay in the Irvine/Aliso Viejo Area. Great Customer Service 24 hours a day. Clean rooms and gym. Great food and drinks specials. Great place to hold business meetings. Plenty of parking. This Homewood has all that you need for great stay away from home.

Summary Heading: Best experience both in customer service and cleanliness.
Summary: Definitely recommended  for any type of family vacation. Well connected with freeway, good parking available.Breakfast was good spread, internet was good. Rooms were good size for a family, very comfy and clean.   Wish we could have stayed more.

Another wonderful Homewood Suites hotel. Spacious and comfortable room with full kitchen. Nice area with shops and restaurants nearby. Good gym, large laundry room, friendly staff. The complimentary breakfast and the supper from Monday to Thursday were very good and makes staying here even better value for the money.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for the business or leisure traveler
Summary: We stayed at this hotel because we were looking for a kitchenette and something newer.  The hotel is a short drive from the beach, close to a lot of stores and places to eat, and would be a great place to stay if you were traveling for work or for fun.  The gym has some nice Precor machines.  They had a great breakfast each day and there was no charge for parking.  If you are a walker there is a longer hill with an incline you can go for a walk on right outside of the hotel.  The staff is friendly and it is located in a very safe area.  I'm not sure you could find a better value for your money in the area.  For context we hit Newport, Laguna beach, and San Diego and found this location perfectly situated off of the highway and easy to get downtown Laguna Beach.

Very clean. Great food selection for breakfast and evening social. Super friendly and helpful staff. My room was large with great furniture, super comfy and overall my stay was great. Also nice that the hotel is so close to the office! I'll be back for sure!

Only a few minutes from the coast and is perfectly situated by a ton of places to eat. Their rooms were very clean and the decor was very comfortable...really made it feel like you weren't in a hotel.

This hotel was located within 6 minutes of where I needed to be.  It was easily accessible, and very nice.  Enjoyed their many options from the breakfast buffet.  Close to nearby walking trails/freeways.  A great place for family/friends for leisure.  I would definitely stay at this location again and would therefore recommend it.

We arrived without our luggage (and had to wait a further 36 hours until it arrived)- little extras from this hotel- such as a universal phone chargers proved to be most valuable (we couldn't have chased up our missing luggage without it!). The breakfast offered plenty of choice and the one evening we sampled the complimentary food it was fine. The location is great- local facilities nearby (although you need a car, but there are few places in LA and the surrounding area that you don't need a car). 10 min drive from Laguna beach, about an hour from downtown LA and 30 mins from Disney. We were more than happy with the value for money, location and facilities and would highly recommend this as a hotel to be based at for a holiday in southern California.

This hotel was excellent. The rooms are extremely spacious and very clean and new. The staff is wonderful, and it's quiet at night. The air worked really well and the fitness center is amazing! Treadmills,weights, machines and even a foam roller. Highly recommend this hotel.

The hotel is very new and in great shape. The rooms are very nicely appointed with a kitchenette and fridge. The hotel is located in a multi-use development that includes condos, boutique shops and a park, Its walking distance to a mall with a movie theatre.

Summary Heading: Great hotel but beware of hidden fees
Summary: The hotel is very well kept, clean, new and very modern looking. It's by far one of the best hotels I have stayed at. The room was very clean and the beds were extremely comfortable. There's free breakfast and free parking.   My only issue was the extra charge of $50 on my credit card after checking out.   On a side note,   Be sure to set the "avoid toll roads/bridges" options on Google maps. I didn't know and took 73 on my first night, so I got a fee of $7. There's other free ways to get to the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to fill out a review on us, we appreciate the feed our guest give us. Please fell free to contact me regarding your concerns of a charge so we can verify.  Thank you,

Summary: Property was fairly new, and we loved the location. Best night's sleep I had in a long time. We stayed four nights, were there visiting family, and taking in a few sights. Breakfast was great and the staff was professional.

Very spacious rooms with full kitchen. The breakfast and the social hour offering is really nice for families. The swimming pool is heated to a very comfortable temperature and very nice to use. The only thing that I would change is a shower curtain for the pool shower area.

We got a call from our condo HOA a week before Christmas stating that they needed to RePipe our unit starting in a few days, during the holidays. Needless to say we were not happy about that. So, during the construction we were going to need a place to stay, and Homewood Suites fit the bill- exactly what we needed. The place was clean and the staff friendly. We ended up staying there both before and after Christmas!

I was in room 328. King bed, bathroom with a tub, fully stocked kitchen . The room was immaculate. Our ONLY complaint was the pullout mattress . It was so uncomfortable I had to sleep on the couch . PLEASE look into a different mattress . The King bed was extremely comfy ! Staff were very welcoming and kind. Breakfast was great . Coffee, teas, oj, apple juice, milk , bagels and toast , pastries , eggs , sausage , fruit, cereals and hot oatmeal , waffles and more to choose from. Plenty of hotel parking also . Couple minutes from Aliso Virgo town Center . Shops, restaurants , bookstore , traded joes and more ! I would definitely stay again and recommend this hotel !

Summary Heading: Clean - lots of perks like coffee
Summary: Clean - lots of perks like coffee.  Some of the guest were rude and made messes for the breakfast staff but the staff was very hard working and worked with a smile. Cleaning of rooms was done very well except for some of the days it was done in a rush - but was still clean.

Summary Heading: Best value in overpriced Orange County
Summary: Very nice and spacious room.  Parking, pool, exercise facilities, all good.  Friendly staff.  Best of all, they provide full hot breakfast and "social hour" dinner, complete with heavy apps and wine!  The only meal we had to buy was lunch.  Color me impressed.

The one bedroom suite was fresh, clean, comfortable, qiuet and very functional with a full well equiped kitchen. All you may need to bring are a few more eating utensils and you are set. The location was in a very safe area with several shopping areas close by and an Edwards Imax theater. Using the 73 toll freeway allowed quick travel to various So Cal. destinations with reduced traffic. Having family in the area...we definitely plan on making Homewood Suites in Aliso Viejo our home away from home on future trips.

Summary Heading: Best service and all around experience I had in a long Time
Summary: Starting with the staff that greets you at the front door you feel welcome. The rooms have great layouts are decorated with a classy but modern touch. Breakfast every morning has everything to suit just about everyone. Monday through Thursday from 5-7 they have a social hour where they serve some great food, beer, and wine. I would recommend this hotel to anyone that would be staying in the area . The rates are beyond reasonable which is hard to imagine when you factor in all that you are getting. Been a long time since i have had the service that the staff and management provides. They go above and beyond to to make sure you have a great stay. I can't wait to come back.

Great location, beautiful property, exceptional rooms and a "feel good environment".  Design, usage of space, cleanliness, service, hotel amenities are all far above standard.  The location is exceptionally good with no "glaring and loud" retail or restaurant/nightlife establishments with hearing range but readily accessible with a short drive.

The hotel for my wife and I was perfect. It's minutes to my parents house. There are a lot of great places to eat close by where you can walk too. We are planning on our next trip and this hotel is apart of the plan. Great value for the dollars spent

I stay at the Homewood suites throughout the country   This particular property is in a beautiful area and is top notch.  Whether it's Keno the general manager Martha the director of sales Matt and Kai at the front desk the engineer Attilio  all of them were spectacular.   I will frequent this property and refer people to it many more times. Great job Homewood see you soon

We stayed two nights in December and enjoyed our time there. The hotel is new with spacious rooms that include a full kitchen, with microwave and refrigerator. The bathroom is one of the largest we've ever had. Everything is nice and clean. Breakfast is decent, with plenty of options. There is a pool and whirlpool, plus an exercise room. Everything you need is here, including an evening reception with drinks. Plus, the price was outstanding for the quality. If there was one negative, it was when we checked out. The lady at the front desk didn't bother a simple 'thank you' or 'did you enjoy your stay?' That would have earned an excellent rating. We will definitely stay here again, as we have family in the immediate area.

Very comfortable king suite with sofa and full kitchen. Newer amenities, very professional and friendly staff and good breakfast options included. Bed was comfy and nice large shower. Highly recommend!!

Summary Heading: Safe Haven during Emergency Home Repairs
Summary: We needed a good place to stay with kitchen while our house was being re-piped following multiple slab leaks. Homewood Suites was nearby, moderately priced and very clean/well appointed. The full breakfast and evening social hour met most of our meal requirements, while having a studio kitchen met our remaining dining needs. Suite was spacious, modern, comfortable and a great value for the price.

Summary Heading: Good for large families, high learning curve for in room features
Summary: Malfunctioning window blinds meant lots of exterior light while trying to sleep and poor lighting during waking hours. No support possible, likely due to short staff on for the holiday. Lots of bells and whistles for basic items, like 2 control panels for 1 fan. Very loud ambient HVAC noise with little operability.

Clean, comfortable, and in nice area.  Would stay here again if given the opportunity. Newer hotel.  Breakfast was ok.  Could use improvement. Hotel has a bar and small pool table in it. Fun for us and the kiddos.

Don't plan on going out for dinner, just visit the evening reception and' you're all set.  Great food morning and night, coffee 24 hours.  Spacious rooms as expected.  Though free, parking is not abundant.

This is a great addition to Aliso Viejo. The hotel is clean, rooms are spacious and extremely clean. The mini kitchen has everything you need. The only problem we had were children running in the room overhead, as late as 10 p.m. The a.m. breakfast had a huge variety of delicious food. We weren't able to attend the evening social hour, due to family commitments, but they even offer food for that, Mon-Thur.

The breakfast area is small and they ran out of food often. There was no evening reception even though the calendar said there was one and we were looking forward to seeing what it was like. I will stay here again, better than the Residence Inn in San Juan Capistrano.

This is a nice hotel not too far from downtown Aliso Viejo.  You can walk to downtown if you don't mind a nice walk and are comfortable walking up and down hills.  The hotel is new and nicely appointed.  There is no restaurant in the hotel so you need leave the hotel for supper.  The hotel does offer a nice breakfast and a very nice afternoon happy hour for guests.  The staff there was very helpful.  One night when I was looking for a place to go to dinner, the individual behind the front desk not only told where where I could get what I wanted and gave me walking directions, he actually walked outside with me and pointed out the directions.  I really appreciated that.  The only negative thing that I can say about this hotel is that when it wasn't happy hour, the drinks were a

Very clean very helpful staff my wife and I loved it,  we would recommend anyone and everyone to come and stay at this Homewood suites.   I generally stay on Hilton properties and I have to say this one was really nice

Lovely hotel with very comfortable rooms. The breakfasts and evening socials made the stay special. We met other guests and were so well attended to by an excellent staff. I recommend this hotel without reservation.

Summary Heading: Lack of front desk Hilton Honors benefits
Summary: Great room, awesome maid service & evening bartender service. Horrible complimentary breakfast & lack of front desk membership knowledge or help. We did not receive any of our Hilton Honor member rewards!

This was my second time staying here and I still fill at home. Very clean rooms with all the amenities you could ask for. I really enjoy the Complimentary evening Social Calendar on the fridge that has evening dinner specials and cocktails as well to relax to and settle for the evening. My favorite of all is the outdoor fire pit filled with different shades of blue glass. Unfortunately it was raining, they also had covered cabanas with huge umbrellas. I will be back as much as possible.

Summary Heading: Beautiful new hotel in convenient location
Summary: Really liked this newer hotel, near shopping and amenities. Friendly staff very helpful with any needs. Offering full breakfast in price with a variety of meals each day. Small bar and outdoor seating with propane heaters and outdoor pool. Roomy studio with full size kitchen and fridge including all plates and needed utensils for cooking meals. Beautiful walk in shower with soft tiled walls and flooring. We had a great stay, I would recommend this hotel for your stay.

We had a great experience! The staff was extremely nice and helpful, the hotel was very clean (this is most important to me), they were very accommodating and the price was just right. The suite makes it feel like less of a hotel and more of a home stay. The complimentary breakfast options were wonderful and varied and the community social event was super fun.  We’ll definitely be staying here again and will check for Homewood Suites in other locations going forward.

The hotel itself is a good concept, it's like a little studio apt with a kitchen.  Great for long term stays or traveling families. Area was very good, close to all shopping, movie theatre and restaurants even a Trader Joe's! The room was pretty clean but the bathroom really needs attention. Noticed beginnings of mildew stains on the floor of the shower as well as in the grout. I really wished I would have brought my rubber shower shoes, but didn't think I would need them since property is rated as a 6 on Hilton site. (not sure why, very disappointing) but I did bring my Lysol spray, as I always do. Also VERY disappointed upon check in that there was only 1 person checking in the line of waiting and not happy travelers. It was about 2:30pm they should be more prepared for this

Summary Heading: One of the nicest hotel stays
Summary: I enjoyed staying at the Homewood Suites in Aliso Viejo. The room was more spacious than expected and furnished with everything we needed. It appeared to be a brand new room. I spent more time in the room than most hotel stays and found it to be extremely comfortable. Loved the furnished kitchen and the comfortable living area and large screen TV. The staff was excellent! Highly recommend staying here!

I was very happy guy that I had picked this place to stay with e recommendation from my daughter. It was a combination trip with business and pleasure. Clean, Comfy, Fair Prices. I will stay there again.

The evening social, morning breakfast, and cozy atmosphere were all excellent amenities. Very beautiful lounging areas and located just 5-10 minutes from highway, kind of awkward to find if unfamiliar to area.

Great location, great atmosphere , recommend to friends  families , we come to the area three + times a year for swim competition staid at many hotels, this was the cleanness and best value  looking forward to the next trip

There with a large group and the hotel staff went above and beyond!  They did an excellent job of handling a large and sometimes loud group.  Facilities were perfect for group dining and get togethers.  Bar was a plus.

Really loved this hotel. Wife and I stayed here for 1 week for a mixture of business and personal. It was like staying in a small apartment! Walking distance to a very nice shopping/eating center with many choices, we watched a movie at the IMAX and had a massage at The Knot Stop. The morning breakfast was great as were the evening socials. Less than 15 minutes to Laguna Beach. Overall a wonderful hotel, very clean and nice and new.

Great place to stay. Quiet. Yummy hot cookies at check in desk. Great evening social with wine and beer. Friendly staff. Very clean rooms. A perfect place to stay. Have a coffee at City Perk and a cookie!!

Hotel is located in a nice and quite location. Rooms and hotel are clean and modern. Great location for a quiet and relaxing stay. Staff is very friendly and goes out of their way to make you feel comfortable.

My family and I stayed at the Homewood Suites in Aliso Viejo at the start of our Californian road trip.  This was our first stop as we were unsure we could get to San Diego from LAX in a reasonable time at rush-hour (we couldn't...)  All our stops were Hilton Hotels and this was the best we experienced on our 2-week vacation.  Rooms were a very good size, new with modern decor and very clean.  Hotel staff were exemplary and this was one of the few times we could park our car for free in the entire trip.  Considering this was only meant to be an overnight stay for travel reasons, this hotel exceeded all our expectations and I have no hesitation to say that we will be back again!

We wanted to stay in Laguna Beach but couldn't find a reasonably priced hotel that wasn't also nice… We ended up staying here and we're happy. There is plenty to walk around nearby the hotel it wasn't too far to the beach and the rooms are very clean.  The hotel was built within the last year or so everything is very nice!

The hotel is situated near by business offices area. Staff are friendly and always willing to help. Breakfast standard need improvement. Room clean with all commodities. The afternoon social gathering is well done and food of good quality.

Great place to stay! Clean and very accommodating.  Staff very friendly. Surprised by the full bar located in the dining area. Had a full selection of whiskey and wines.  I will make it a point to stay here the next time in the Irvine area.

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel in Laguna Beach area
Summary: Very clean comfortable room, friendly staff and yummy high quality breakfast and happy hour/dinner.  The location was convenient and comfortable and it was a 12 minute drive to beach.  The outdoor lounging area with heated fire pits was very relaxing.  We also used the hot tub and it was clean and inviting.  We totally enjoyed our stay and highly recommend to others.

Very nice new hotel with lovely spacious rooms and comfortable bed. Gracious staff and nice breakfast buffet. Was traveling for business and had a nice stay. Surprisingly quiet even though my room was right next to highway (4th Floor). Didn't use the kitchenette, but it was clean and supplied with dishes. Good trip.

Summary Heading: One of the best hotels I've stayed in
Summary: I stayed for 11 nights at this Homewood Suites. The hotel itself is clean, away from noisy roads, and very well kept. The staff is wonderful--At the front desk, it was a pleasure to meet Matt (day shift) and Edgar (night shift.) Aracely from the housekeeping crew was always happy to help. They all showed the high level of customer service that compelled me to write this review. The area around the hotel is very nice--you can go for a nice walk and explore the area--and there are grocery stores, restaurants, gas stations, etc within walking distance. When I visit the area again, I will definitely return to this hotel.

It's almost brand new, and clean, with very friendly people. The rates are great for this location. In fact, there are very few properties close by. The breakfast is a cut above Hyatt House, where I often stay, but like all the properties in this category, the limited selection gets old after a few days. I want to especially praise Sally at the front desk, who was extremely helpful in helping us extend our stay.

Summary Heading: It was a pleasure to stay.
Summary: We arrived rather early and they gave us our room bf check in time. We were really grateful for that. Not a lot of traffic in the area. Very nice and tranquil. Also the complimentary  breakfast was pretty decent.

Stayed for 4 nights at end of vacation.  Had a king bed suite,  nice and roomy,  clean and comfortable.  Small kitchenette was handy.   Location is in a newly built/building industrial park but no real issues,  not much in immediate vicinity for eating/drinking but nothing far away either.  Shopping plaza down the street has options like panda express,  chillis etc.   Used pool and hot tub,  we were only ones out there and it was sunny all day,  plenty of beds, umbrellas and towels.   Laundry had about 10 washers and dryers but steep at $3 each machine.   Breakfast was OK,  free so never going to complain,  cereals, toast,  oatmeal,  chilled things and a couple of hot selections.   Overall a great stay.

Great hotel and anemeties...staff was hospitable and welcoming...room was spacious and clean...the evenings free food, wine and beer hit the spot after a long day of work...well done Homewood suites, well done!

Summary Heading: Amazed at the quality and finishings of the rooms
Summary: I feel this hotel is a perfect place to stay if you're looking for comfort, cleanliness and good service. Felt like my own apartment. Very happy with our choice! Perfect location for SO CAL. We liked the gym and most importantly our room really was perfect.

Very comfortable, clean, attractive room. Staff was very helpful with room selection. Complimentary breakfast is a full, hot breakfast and very tasty. Location is easy to find in a nice area and reasonable distance from local attractions. I would definitely book here again.

The decor is really nice - contemporary, rooms are well furnished with lots of plugs and USB charging ports.  The fitness room is well equipped.  The staff is very friendly and helpful. The location is convenient to a number of restaurants.

This new Homewood Suites is overall a great find and seems to be cheaper than much pricier hotels closer to Irvine/Costa Mesa and other Orange County locations.  The studio suite is massive and more than plenty of space for 1. Very modern, chic, hip design and quite comfortable furniture and bed, modern new kitchens.  Full hot breakfast plentiful and typical of other Homewoods.  Quiet area in a new development and the 73 toll road is close by for an easy and congestion-free drive to avoid the traffic on the 405.   I would absolutely stay here again with one caveat about room location that other travelers might want to heed. Rooms ending 21 (121-421) get a ton of elevator noise, even though they are not actually next to the elevator bank. Apparently there is a mechanical room on

This is a comfortable hotel with a very nice breakfast and evening buffet. The front desk staff and food staff were really good. Plenty of parking and good public spaces. One very annoying issue is that the bathroom sink is in the bedroom area. When traveling as a couple this will disturb the later sleeper causing early morning grumbling.

This is a newer hotel and it was clean and welcoming.  The staff were all friendly and the lobby, pool and fitness center were more than adequate.  I loved the breakfast in the morning and the room was fully stocked and comfortable.  We stayed on a Friday night so we missed the weeknight evening reception which was disappointing because it sounds amazing. You will not be disappointed staying here.

Summary Heading: Beautiful property, staff are young and unprofessional.  Not worth the cost, pick another Hilton property.
Summary: This location is nice, construction next door.  Art deco building.  Food was akin to a continental breakfast.  Shower handle fell off on my toe, staff did not care.  Parking is limited. I am a diamond member with Hilton and selected a late check out for an hour, housekeeping knocked on door with rude tone and demanded that I call the front desk because she did not have it on her paperwork. Finally I noticed that I was overcharged for internet access and had to call to have it removed.  I stay with Hilton's across the nation and this one is ranked low because service and quality is lacking.  I am not a something for nothing person but I do believe that you should have good service to get good ratings even if things happen out of your control.

The hotel was located in a quiet business community.  There were stores and eatery's close.  The room was clean, a nice size, and quiet.  We've already planned 2 more stays there. Thank you Laguna Homewood!

Although we only stayed one night, it was Excellent. Nice clean, modern, quiet, comfortable king suite.  The desk staff was great.  The full, morning breakfast was delicious, and the dining room was nice and spacious. The entry and parking lot areas were also nice and clean and well lit.  We have always found these properties to be well tended to!

The Homewood Suites in Aliso Viejo are modern, new and a great place to stay.  I will definitely stay here again when in town.  Spacious bedroom, dishwasher, bathtub, large flat screen tv.  Plates and other kitchen utensils were included with the room.

We have family in this area and there are not many hotels close by. This is the best we have found so far. The rooms are comfortable and spacious. The free breakfast has a lot of options. There is a small area to purchase snacks which is good because there are no food options within walking distance. My son is used to staying in expensive, swanky hotels and he really liked this place.

Clean rooms, comfy beds, fully equippe d kitchenette /friendly personnel/ surrounded by greenery  Relaxing atmosphere away from city sounds - everything is so close but you need a car  Definitly coming back again

Coming from a tourist town it was great to see amazing service given when we go on vacation! This hotel is great for the kids and us parents! From check-in , breakfast, evening reception team, and housekeeping this team is top notch! The pool has great day sun. Great location with shopping minutes away , theatre, grocery store and more! 100% we are coming back next year! Thank you all for a great week!

I absolutely love staying at Homewood Suites primarily for the size and layout of the rooms, secondarily for the free breakfast and social hour.  When I found out a new one was opening near my corporate office I was ecstatic!  The close proximity to restaurants and other entertainment options is also a plus.

The Homewood Suites Laguna/Aliso was an excellent hotel for a 2 night business stay.  Not far from the major highways and very close to the town center with shops, bars, restos all within close, but not too close proximity made this an ideal location.  The room itself was perfect.  Plenty of space, clean, and modern.  Staff was great, too.

Virtually everything - the room (1 bedroom suite), the breakfast, evening social the staff exceeded expectation. We didn't use the pool, the gym or the laundry facilities, but I expect to use them next time we visit. The cost was very reasonable. I will be back.

Summary Heading: If I could live there it would be perfect!
Summary: The Experience was Real:  I checked in for 3 nights at The Homewood Suites. I give this Hotel five stars. Everyone was very friendly, and when I got to the room I couldn't believe how beautiful it was. It felt like I was right on the beach even though the beach is not far from the hotel. They had extra towels, extra pillows , extra blankets and the king size bed was so very comfortable. The suite had a wonderful couch plus sitting space where you could work and a whole kitchen area including the dishes and silverware also a refrigerator and a dishwasher. Huge flat screen TV. Unbelievably clean and the walk-in shower was huge with glass doors. After enjoying the room and unpacking I headed down to meet the travel group for dinner. We drove 10 mins to the mall called (The Shops at

Beautiful and brand new hotel with spacious rooms, convenient parking, and perfectly located to everything!.  The customer service was great also.  And you receive free breakfast!!  But the big surprise was the price!  Excellent!

If ya'lls wanna kick back n relax den dis is da place nah mean. Dey got dem free breakfasts if u know what I'm sayin. Free mah peoples. Da beds be hella comfy so u get dem good shut eyes. I be back again wit ma peeps

Summary Heading: The BEST of the best Homewoods Suites by Hilton!
Summary: I have stayed at a handful of Homewood Suites by Hilton properties and hands down this location is the best of them all! We had top notch customer service from the get go, from being upgraded from a studio suite to a 1 bedroom suite to all the info as to where to eat, shop and tour around.   We had a 1 bedroom suite that had a kitchen which was full equipped. Bed was comfy and overall suite was clean. There were a couple of previous reviews that mentioned the bad parking situation, however we never had an issue with it and even if the hotel's main parking lot was full (it's a large lot), the overflow parking is very close, just a minute walk away.  On Monday to Thursdays they have an evening reception which I must say, is even more than your average Hilton property evening

Ok This Hotel,is new  The room,is very big  I stay 2 weeks  I love this place,the staff very nice  Breakfast very good Good GYM,little pool still ok Nice area  The manager front desk,very good too Really like this place

Wonderful new hotel with superb friendly, helpful staff! Second visit and will be back ! The room was spacious with excellent closet space, very comfortable beds and bedding, and perfect kitchenette! Loved it!

Brett was a wonderful breakfast host, Carlos and Susie were friendly and helpful throughout our stay.  The outdoor area with bbqs and seating was perfect for our guests and we were able to watch football and play pool in the lounge of the hotel which was very fun!

We wanted a trip to the beach without breaking the bank. We were surprised how nice this hotel was when we arrived! Everything still smelled brand new. Gorgeous hotel and located near lots of restaurants and shopping. Only takes a few minutes to get to the beach.

Nice new hotel with great rooms and amenities. Seemed like a new property. Great location to Laguna and Irvine. The room set up was awesome with the kitchenette, large screen TV's. I would stay here again... Highly Recommend.

Over all very good would stay here again listed a few minor problems. The shower handle fell off last few days we were there and we just put it back on so did not ask them to fix it.  The maids needed to empty all garbage and there was some food left in fridge when we cam in the room. When we arrived late the night shift was not that friendly but the day people wer awesome. We stayed a week I would stay again nice hotel

Spacious room, full kitchen including a refrigerator and stove top comfortable beds, soft sheets, great pillows, clean, will fit 4 comfortably, living room area. Nice fire pit outside lobby. Room décor seemed new. 10-15 minutes outside of Laguna Beach.

I was only in the area for an overnight stay and selected this hotel after looking at similar properties online. I liked that it was new and the hotel offered the best amenties--a real hot breakfast with plenty of options, evening social that included dinner & beverage, friendly staff & the room/suite was very nice.  The design was efficient, the shower great and the bed extremely comfortable.  I think I got way more than I expected for the price paid.

This suite was ideal for our family!  Spacious, comfortable, affordable and just a short drive to beautiful Laguna Beach!  The breakfast was outstanding, unlike most "breakfast included" hotels.  The outside areas were complete with outdoor dining, pool, jacuzzi and fireside lounge. Highly recommend this hotel!

We were in for just a Friday night to visit relatives a mile away. The Hotel is new (6 mos) and everything is in excellent shape. Room was large with kitchen and FULL size appliances, not your two foot fridge and shoe box microwave.  Bed was comfortable, full walk-in shower, large screen TV, nice desk/work area and I really liked the convenience outlets on the lamps, power outlet and USB port on them so you don't have to leave your phone by the wall.   A good selection of your standard breakfast items that were satisfactory but I could do without the "rubber" fried eggs, not sure how they make those.

Very happy with my 6 night stay at this hotel. Immaculate condition, staff was fantastic and the breakfast and evening social was a huge bonus. I was very pleased and will definitely return again. No complaints at all!

We arranged a block of rooms for our son's wedding - 13 to be exact. Martha, our contact was organized, patient and a joy to work with. She went the extra mile to organize a private room for a family breakfast gathering. The front desk staff was friendly and helpful. The dining/breakfast/ social hour staff were amazing - very accommodating and patient with the large number of people they had to deal with. The Labor Day weekend was crowded , so they were tested!  Both the breakfast and evening light dinner were fresh, tasty and plentiful .   The location was easy to find, close to shopping and restaurants and quiet!  The property is new, well designed, clean and attractive . The patio area is spacious and the pool/spa seemed roomy.   Highly recommended - we would return in a

Everyone was extremely friendly. The suites are new and spacious. The breakfast and evening socials are excellent. I would absolutely come back and will recommend when family and friends visit. The maid service is the best I have ever experienced at any hotel or extended stay. They slip in and out before you blink and do all your dishes. I was amazed everyday and we stayed for over a month.

Summary Heading: Comfortable Suite and Nice Breakfast for a Good Price
Summary: We liked our suite and the breakfast. We also enjoyed the pool and jacuzzi. The suite we had was over the entrance, so unfortunately we could hear the trucks coming and going. Also, the grounds were being worked on next door, so when we were outdoors you could smell a manure odor.

Have stay at this hotel several times since they opened earlier this year and we are already planning to stay there again in September and October. Great facility, great staff and like the fact that they include breakfast and a social hour.

We stayed for 5 days at this hotel during our recent stay in SO Cal. Although the Aliso Viejo area doesn't qualify as destination, it has great access to the beach cities with much friendlier rates and room sizes. This hotel hit the right spot and is brand new as well!

This hotel was awesome clean and had all the amenities I needed for my stay, I want to plan a trip near there just so I can stay the whole weekend again. Loved the evening entertainment to bad I didn't get to stay long enough to enjoy it!

The hotel is perfectly located for anything and everything. 10 minutes to the beach and 2 minutes from shopping.   I had a 2 week stay. Mostly business but was visited by family for a long weekend. The hotel delivered perfectly on both fronts.  Very clean. Great big rooms with mini kitchen.   Parking was never an issue as I had read in other posts. Not once over two weeks did I not find a parking space.   Great hotel!

We loved our one night stay!  We thought the hotel was easy to get to and appreciated the free parking.  Loved the social hour, appreciates free breakfast.  Found the hotel to be clean and staff friendly.  Love having the ability to do laundry.  Took us about 18 minutes to get to Laguna Beach.  Our room was spacious, clean, and comfortable.

Please note that the main access to this hotel is by a toll road. It appears to be in a newly built up area so you are rather isolated in terms of restaurants and you must have a car. Our flight was cancelled the night before and when I called the hotel to inform them, they said my options were to pay for the night I didn't use to preserve my booking or cancel my booking altogether. We arrived to rather indifferent staff and made our way to the suprisingly large and well appointed room. The breakfast is a rather unpleasant experience. I would liken it to barnyard feeding frenzy where piles of low quality, greasy food are laid out and everyone pushes and elbows their way to the front to take 3 times more than they could ever eat. Then leave the table/ eating area a totally

We recently booked a room here because it was close to Laguna Beach, and the REVIEWS looked awesome.  Here's what went wrong for us:  Make sure you register at the toll road, yes, it's on a toll road.  There is construction on ALL sides of the of hotel.....lots of noise, lots of dust....a guy with a hard hat on had to open a gate to let us in.  When we checked in, the woman behind the desk gave us a card to fill out to sit on the dashboard of our car, telling us that they may call us before 7 AM to move our car, or it might be towed.  On the way to our room, with absolutely no help from the staff, the fire alarm went off.  We were in our room for 20 minutes, and the fire alarm went off 3 more times.  The floor in the bathroom and kitchenette area had pieces of mop fiber on them.

So clean and staff is amazing! Free breakfast and coffee and Internet is great! It is so close to everything you need. I will definitely be back! Love this place! I have stayed here 3 times now. There is a nice trail/ path behind the hotel to excercise.

Summary Heading: Get there while the getting is good!
Summary: We went here because it was "centrally" located to a few of the UC's but found it to be one of the nicest Homewood's we have ever stayed in.  It seems to be fairly new and had everything we could possibly want.  We have had great success in staying at Homewood Suites in the past.  When we arrived we were pleasantly surprised at the social hour being held which precluded us from having to go out and find dinner.  It was quite enjoyable.  The hotel itself is located in a new development that is mixed residential and business though still somewhat under construction.  There seems to be a lot going on right there which will make this a great destination very soon.

Summary Heading: A home away from home environment
Summary: The staff was friendly and helpful. Breakfast was free and had a nice selection of items such as eggs, waffles, pastries, fresh fruit and coffee. The hot tub and pool were well maintained and the location was very secluded and convenient. Natalie, a food service worker, was one of the nicest people I've ever encountered.

I was unhappy that my reservation was changed without my knowledge from a 1 bedroom suite to a accessible studio! When I asked to be changed to the room I requested,I was told I could for about $40 .I will not stay at Homewood Suites again even though I'm in this area every year.

Good place to stay. Rooms were clean. Staff were helpful. Breakfast service area too small therefore it gets very crowded and difficult to move around.   Although it is not a major issue or concern, I did my reservation on the phone with the help of a representative, and I was told the first night will be $179, second night would be  $169 and the 3rd night would be $155. However, I was charged $179 for every night. Again, it is a big deal/issue and no worries.

Summary Heading: Not Ready for weekend "Prime Time" yet
Summary: Recent construction so not everything was finished - no liquor license for the lounge yet hence the title of not being ready for prime time on the weekends (weekdays they have a complimentary beer and wine reception but not on Fridays, Saturdays and Sundays :-( ). This is a great place to stay when visiting the OC as it is easy to get anywhere you need to go from here. The suites are large with full-size refrigerators and a well-stocked kitchen. Beds were very comfy and the sofa sleeper wasn't worn-out yet!  The staff was friendly and tried to accommodate any need. We had to wait for our room to be ready - they were completely full that weekend - they gave us water while we waited and came and got us when it was ready.  The common areas were large with plenty of seating for many

I selected this hotel based only on the location and price. When I saw the room I was stunned. The room was so spacious and beautiful I wanted to stay longer. The living room was huge (for a hotel) with plenty of seating, nice kitchen, a desk with ports for working and a nice bathroom. A full wall of windows with a great view. This was a regular room with two queen beds - no upgrade.

Our time at this hotel was great!  The group of people I was with were a lot of fun.  We had good interaction with the hotel team and felt right at home.  After our conference we came back to enjoyed the pool, hot tub, fitness center and lovely patio.   Loved the big pool  towels!  We felt safe and secure and enjoyed our lovely room.

This hotel is brand new and is lovely. It is close to Laguna so you can get there quickly for a visit. The room comfortably slept our family of 6 and the pool, fire-pit and pool table were fun for the kids.

Summary Heading: Great location for beaches and Disney. Luxury self contained suite.
Summary: Great good quality free breakfast and evening social. Free coffee, tea and cookies available in lobby 24 hours.  Suite was large, really nicely furnished with Self contained kitchen and full size fridge. Really good location, easy 30 minute drive to Disney and 10 minuets from some stunning beaches. Hotel modern, comfortable and clean. Really nice staff. Free parking.

Summary Heading: Brand new hotel , very modern with great rooms
Summary: Loved the light and airy feel , super comfy beds , rooms were spotless  Forget breakfast unless you like a rugby scrum !  AC was noisy but windows opened which was a bonus  Very accessible to Laguna beach and OC  near a mall and cinema complex - easy to walk to

Very nice hotel.  This property does not have enough guest parking. Alternate parking was give which was down the street at a business garage however we had to move our car by 7:00 am or risk having our car towed .

We stayed here for a family wedding. The room was spotless. Loved that everything was brand new. The pool area was clean and we enjoyed the outdoor area and firepit. The is a little convenience area by the front desk where you can by snacks. The breakfast was much better than we expected.

Family vacation with kids to visit surrounding amusement parks and beaches.  Loved the room and kitchen.  Very comfortable and well appointed.  Staff was helpful.  Breakfast was great.  On site laundry came in handy.  Would definitely stay again.

I lived in a Homewood Suites for 7 months so I am a good person to review Homewoods since I have spent a lot of time in them.  I am staying here with my husband and 2 kids until we find a house. We moved here from the east coast and arrived in OC on Saturday, July 21.  We moved from hotel to hotel due to the area being sold out due to Comican and the fires but finally found this GEM by the grace of God.  We are booked to stay for a month with the possibility of extending a month more.  I LOVE THIS HOTEL.  it is brand new as of February. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful especially Lauren, the front desk manager. Matt works at night and he is great too,  They helped me find a bigger room since we are here for an extended stay.  The rooms are beautiful with upgraded

Summary Heading: New Hotel in a Convenient Location
Summary: This is a new hotel just off Aliso Viejo Parkway.  It's near the 73 Toll Road, but far enough so that I didn't hear it.  The staff were very friendly, even for a late night check in.  The rooms (see photos) are fairly large, with a desk and mini living room as you first walk in.  There is no divider to the bed, like say an Embassy Suites, but the rooms are a good size.  The hotel is brand new (5 months old according to the staff), so everything is in really good condition, which is always a plus.  Breakfast was good, with eggs, bacon, fruit, pastries and a waffle maker that many were taking advantage of.  There is a happy hour reception which was also a nice touch after working all day.  Free glass of wine and some trail mix was a good way to relax.  What impressed me was that

This hotel was a great space to stay for our family of 4.  The room layout was great, with space for a couch/play area and a separate kitchen/bathroom space.  The staff was extremely kind and helpful.  We misplaced our room key once and it was replaced, no questions asked.  Also one of the breakfast staff had a nice conversation with my 3 year old daughter who is quite shy.  Very accommodating.

Summary Heading: Large suite, great service, great location
Summary: The experience was positive. The suite was large and comfortable, the breakfast was better than most hotels of similar class, and the staff were pleasant and accommodating. I used points for one of our nights and felt the award amount was a bit exorbitant.

I was there with my family for visiting Laguna beach area. It was 15 mim driving but very comfortable and quiet place.  This hotel is very new, everything is still shiny. very good for the family with little kids.

Summary Heading: Clean and modern hotel, not far from Laguna Beach.
Summary: Our studio room was huge, and so clean and modern looking.  This hotel is just a short (maybe 10 minutes) drive from the "downtown" Laguna area.  Breakfast was good and featured a great southwestern style egg dish.

Stayed here because it was close for a lacrosse tournament - breakfast normal homewood suites fare, pool was small, but they had a nice outdoor seating area with lights overhead and a grill. Room looks like it had been updated - walk in shower only but head had many options, kitchen available and beds were comfy with many pillow choices! Great stay

We were extremely pleased with the quality of the hotel and the service.    It seems like a great hotel for business and family.   We did see quite a few families with children staying at the hotel.   However, we were never disturbed by them.  Will definitely stay again.

I stayed at this hotel for a week recently for a house-hunting trip in Southern California.  This property is brand spanking new and really nice.  The rooms are superb!  The beds wonderful, the living areas more than adequate.  The service level at the hotel was outstanding.  My only complaint was the quality of the food, especially at breakfast.    Highly recommend.

Summary Heading: Great Experience; Will book here again
Summary: This hotel made for a rewarding experience during our 4 night/5 day vacation. Loved that it was brand new and hope they keep up with refurbishing in years to come, as we will return for many more summer trips to this location. Along with the new-ness of guest rooms and public areas, they also had comfortable beds, spacious rooms with a kitchenette (which was perfect for our family to store groceries and prepare lunch and snacks for our trips to the beach everyday). We loved the attractiveness of the public areas and cannot rave enough about the dining they offer by their free buffet breakfast evening social from Monday thru Thursday. Both had so many item selections, and although the evening social is promoted with saying appetizer servings, there is really so much food and

Summary Heading: Nice, clean and newly opened hotel in a very nice location
Summary: Recently opened hotel surrounded by modern business/offices and a walking distance to a very nice strip mall with plenty of restaurants and a nice movie theater. Who can beat their array of yummy hot breakfast serves every morning and from Monday to Thursday serves dinner? No one! Appreciate all that. When we travel, we love to stay in Homewood Suites as much as we can. This place is super clean and with modern decor.

We stayed at the hotel because it was not far from Pageant of the Masters in Laguna Beach and were pleasantly surprised by how nice it is. The public spaces as well as the rooms are beautifully furnished and immaculately clean, and the complimentary breakfast buffet each morning was a bonus--so much nicer than what's offered at other suite hotels we've stayed at!

The only reason I chose this hotel was because of my Hilton Honors affiliation - I couldn't have been more pleased! The convenience of the breakfast and social hour in the evening was delightful and everyday it seemed that I met friends! Another surprise was the variety of food choices used in both venues. It was very clear that thought was given to the special needs and food requirements for a variety of people. Again, I couldn't have chosen a better hotel or location! Right around the corner from the hotel was a nice variety of shops and restaurant choices - simply another element of convenience!

We recently stayed at the Homewood Suites while attending a family reunion in Laguna Beach. The location was minutes from Laguna Beach. We really enjoyed the modern, clean and nicely appointed suite. The staff was helpful and very polite. We would definitely stay here again.

Homewood Suites in Aliso Viejo opened for business back in March and the hotel itself is first rate. The lobby and lounge areas are very comfortable and clean, the rooms are spacious enough and the beds are very comfortable. The hotel offers complimentary breakfast that is the standard breakfast fare, although not the cook to order kind you would find at an Embassy Suites. Overall, the room and amenities are very nice.  The problem with this hotel is the parking is atrocious. There are not nearly enough spaces for guests when the hotel is full (which it was during our stay). They offered a parking structure down the street to park (for free) and walk back to the hotel. Overall we enjoyed our stay but the parking was a drawback.

The hotel is brand new and has only been open since early 2016 so the rooms and facilities are still in good shape.  The breakfast buffet was very adequate and the entrees were fresh and delicious with healthy choices available.  The pool area and exercise facilities are very nice.  The laundry area is very convenient and a single load can be washed and dried for $6 by feeding the machines directly.  The lobby area and rooms are immaculate, in fact they're brand new, as already mentioned.  We had a smaller room with a kitchenette, which had all the necessary supplies to prepare in-house meals etc.    However, the best part of staying at this hotel had to be the staff.  I honestly think that the staff that we interacted with have to be the friendliest and most professional that

Beautiful hotel in a very quiet location.  Suite was a lovely - modern design.  Staff was very friendly and helpful.  Complimentary breakfast and evening social are quite an added-value.  Kitchen was well-stocked for all of your cooking needs including tupperware.

We extended our stay as we have been so satisfied with the hotel. Totally new hotel (5months). Friefly staff. Nice, large rooms. When we asked fir diner options, we have been provided a large number if alternatives. Also very helpful hints for beaches.

We stayed three  nights in one of the 2 bedroom suites.  Room and bathroom was very clean.  Breakfast was average and evening reception was a little disappointing compared to other Homewood Suites I've been to.  There is a condo community directly across the street.  Beautiful to walk in the evening after dinner to burn some calories, enjoy the fresh air and city view from above.

Great place to stay and we enjoyed our large room that accommodated our entire family! We also enjoyed having a kitchen where we could pack lunches for the beach. Very nice to have a BBQ out by the pool to cook hot dogs while kids were swimming as well as a outdoor shower to clean off after the sandy beach. Will definitely stay here again!

Summary Heading: Get away for the long weekend
Summary: We enjoy the hotel, the area is nice and we love the chimney at the lobby , the staff very courteous and they go the estra mile to help you.   It is clean, I loved the coffe and breakfast. so close to Laguna beach.  We did have a good time.

Went for a softball tournament and had a great stay. The room was great. Spacious and immaculate. The breakfast buffet was better than average. Stores and restaurants pretty close by, with good variety. The pool was busy.

Summary Heading: Great Brand New Hotel with many Perks!
Summary: My family and I stayed at the Homewood Suites from June 16th – July 6th 2016. We moved from Spokane WA to Laguna Niguel and were waiting on our movers to arrive at our new home. We have 3 adults, toddler and a one month old infant. The hotel is brand new and very esthetically pleasing to the eye.  We stayed in a 1 bedroom King Suite and the price was reasonable. The hotel has a lot of perks including a nice breakfast and an awesome social event each night. Just like breakfast each night there is a theme food selection. Some nights Asian, some nights BBQ with others even serving PHO! During the social event Mon-Thurs, there is free wine and beer served which they had some pretty good selections. The staff are so friendly. They go above and beyond to ensure your stay is

I found this hotel to be terrific.  The room was very clean, large and functional and I would recommend this hotel without hesitation.  The afternoon complimentary light dinner was a complete pleasant surprise.

Brand new hotel in business district.  Easy access off toll road, 15 minute drive from beach and 10 minute walk to great shopping center with food, movies and stores.  Great staff, clean rooms, large breakfast area and outside patio.  Highly recommend this hotel

Summary Heading: Beautiful and brand new close to Laguna Beach
Summary: New hotel with beautiful, spacious rooms. Pool is on the small side but there is plenty of lounging area. Breakfast, parking, and wifi included. Short drive to Laguna Beach. Excellent value! Surrounding area under construction was only detractor.

This was an outstanding stay in a value chain hotel. The location is near a lot of businesses but is within driving distance to many amenities and the beach! For a family vacation this was excellent as it had a clean pool & was equipped with a small kitchen that served our needs perfectly!

Summary Heading: Great new hotel with great staff
Summary: I was impressed with this brand new hotel.  The rooms were very nice, have a full kitchen and even included a ceiling fan.  I booked the hotel via one of the travel sites and I accidentally selected the wrong dates.  Lauren, the front desk manager, was a huge help with getting my error resolved.  I would definitely stay at this hotel again.

Fantastic! It's new, so it's very clean, but is well maintained. The staff was extremely nice and helpful and the complimentary food was great. I would happily stay here again. In the dining area, the materials are light in color so are easily stained, but they are clean. I highly recommend this to anyone staying in the area, it's by far the best!

The staff at this location is friendly and helpful.  The hotel is clean and the breakfast buffet is always decent.  At this time of year, the strawberries are better than those at the grocery store.  The beds are soft and the pillows are down filled.  The sofa bed is greatly lacking in comfort (trampoline type bottom with a spring mattress on top = uncomfortable for anyone older than about five).  The rooms we rented were very clean.  The hot tub and pool are also in good repair.  I like that you get a full size refrigerator/freezer in the room - we were able to freeze our water bottles for the drive home).

Loved the contemporary decor and then was also surprised to have such a nice trendy hotel that had a kitchen with full refrigerator.  The suite was incredibly comfortable for a long term stay (or even just one night).  The location was walking distance to so many shops, businesses, and restaurants.  However, with the complimentary Happy Hour and Breakfast, there really is no need to go out.  I felt like I was at a high class resort when all I really expected was moderately nice hotel.  This exceeded my expectations in many ways.

Had a wonderful mini-vacation! The staff was extremely happy and helpful. There were beautiful modern touches on the room.. PLUS we could see the TV from anywhere in the room :D. We Will certainly recommend this property to others in the area!!
